Introduction.en: Regular Garden-variety zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普普通通的前院僵尸。

Chat.en: Basic Zombie hates the term "Basic". He doesn't consider himself some generic foe or common corpse. He's individual, darn it, and he's going to make a difference even if it kills you.
Chat.zh: 普通僵尸讨厌被称作“普通”。他不认为自己只是一个平凡的敌对者，甚至只是个随处可见的死尸。他可是很独立的，该死的，而且在你死之前他都会对局面造成影响。

Introduction.en: His traffic cone headpiece makes him twice tougher than normal zombies.
Introduction.zh: 他的交通路障使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: After a wild night, Conehead Zombie woke up holding a mysterious receipt for a cone and industrial strength adhesive.
Chat.zh: 经历了狂热的一晚，路障僵尸迷迷糊糊醒了过来，手里拿着一张奇怪的路障和工业强力胶的收据。

Introduction.en: His bucket hat makes him extremely resistant to damage.
Introduction.zh: 他头上的铁桶使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: There was a time when Buckethead Zombie was hailed as a zombie genius for his innovative bucket-on-head strategy. It's been a few years, though, and zombies wonder if he's got any surprises left. His secret? He doesn't.
Chat.zh: 有段时间铁桶僵尸被当作一个天才崇拜，因为他创新出了头上戴铁桶的战略。即便过了几年，僵尸们还在想他能给大家带来什么其他惊喜。其实他一直有个秘密，那就是没有！

Introduction.en: Brickhead Zombie's brick head provides thorough brickheaded brickheadness.
Introduction.zh: 砖头僵尸的砖头让他彻底变得比砖头还要更砖头。

Chat.en: After consultation with various storybook wolves, it was determined that straw helmets and wood helmets were not up to snuff, and that brick helmets had to be seriously considered.
Chat.zh: 经过与各路童话恶狼的答辩，事实证明稻草头盔和木头盔质量根本不行，砖头盔才是最值得考虑的方案。

Introduction.en: His flag marks the arrival of a huge pile or "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 他的旗帜预示着一大批或者一大波僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: A spelling impaired zombie named "Brian", Flag Zombie keeps thinking the rest of the zombies are talking to him. At least he feels important.
Chat.zh: 他的名字叫“瑙兹”，然而他的读写太差劲了，这使得旗帜僵尸一直以为其他僵尸在叫他的名字，这至少让他觉得自己很受待见。

Introduction.en: Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a large clot or "pile" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 大动员僵尸和他的旗帜代表着超大群僵尸的来临。

Chat.en: Rally Zombie splurged on the all-leather flag because, heck, he's worth it.
Chat.zh: 大动员僵尸花大价钱买来了这面全皮制的旗帜，因为，啧，总之这很值得。

Introduction.en: Is hurled onto the lawn past your defenses, then shuffles ahead.
Introduction.zh: 通常被丢到草坪中央，越过你的防线，然后再一拐一拐往前走。

Chat.en: What he lacks in reach he more than makes up for with his bad attitude, or zombattitude as he likes to call it. Don't encourage him.
Chat.zh: 他更倾向于用他的消极态度弥补了他缺失的东西，他称之为“丧度”。别惯着他比较好。

Introduction.en: Gargantuar really is kind of a big deal.
Introduction.zh: 巨尸确实不好对付。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with pole
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用电线杆摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: throws imp when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时丢出小鬼

Chat.en: Gargantuar is the embodiment of power, made real. He is a juggernaut of hunger, from which there is no escape. He is fear unleashed. Well, he's fear slightly leashed.
Chat.zh: 巨尸是力量的化身，是实实在在的。他的饥饿力量势不可挡，因此别想躲过他。他会让草坪弥漫恐惧。额，好歹是稍微提升了点恐惧感吧。

Introduction.en: "You're not supposed to see me in the Almanac."
Introduction.zh: “你不应该能在图鉴里看到我。”

Chat.en: The zombie needs some privacy.
Chat.zh: 请给这只僵尸一点隐私。

Introduction.en: With its inflatable duck-like flotation apparatus, the Ducky Tube can quickly waddle its way through water with ease.
Introduction.zh: 套上充气的鸭子形漂浮设备，鸭子泳圈僵尸可以轻松在水中摇摆前进。

DESCRIPTION.en: increase movement while on water
DESCRIPTION.zh: 在水中移速提升

Chat.en: While many scientists argue over the origins of the Ducky Tube, few can deny its classification. Clearly it is not a duck as some would like to believe.
Chat.zh: 科学家们都在因鸭子泳圈的原形而争吵，几乎没人愿意否认它源自鸭子，很多人却坚信这一点，尽管很明显那不是。

Introduction.en: Phenomenally sized zombie stuffed into a tiny unliving space.
Introduction.zh: 非常大的僵尸被塞进了非常小的密闭空间。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with pole
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用电线杆摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: throws imp when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时丢出小鬼

Chat.en: The ceramic confines of the Vase Gargantuar's home has done nothing to his endless hunger, his immense power, or his vast destructive potential. However, his footspeed could be better.
Chat.zh: 瓷制的囚笼并没有让瓶中巨尸丧失那无尽的饥饿、巨大的力量，以及毁灭一切的潜力。不过，他的步伐还得加把劲。

Introduction.en: Zombie Bobsled Teams will take any ice trail as an excuse to slide down the lawn.
Introduction.zh: 雪橇小队会从任何延伸到草坪外的冰道滑出。

Chat.en: Meet the lean, mean bobsledding machine - the Zombie Bobsled Team! These undead athletes stick together like glue, or should we say frosty ice? They're the epitome of teamwork, never leaving a ghoul behind.
Chat.zh: 见识一下精英中的精英——雪橇小队！这些不死的运动员们如同胶水般形影不离，或许更像是霜冻一样无懈可击？他们是团队合作的榜样，从不丢下任何一个成员。

Introduction.en: Zombie Bobsled Crews will carry on even without their trusty sled.
Introduction.zh: 雪橇运动员僵尸即使丢掉了他们的雪橇也会不断前行。

Chat.en: Their bobsled might be history, but these zombies are living for the thrill of the chill!
Chat.zh: 也许他们的雪橇运动事迹已成历史，但他们可是为了霜冻的快乐而生！

Introduction.en: Balloon carries zombies over barriers and ground defenses.
Introduction.zh: 气球使他能够跨越障碍物和地上的植物。

Chat.en: Balloon zombie has no idea where the balloon came from, but he's going with it and he's open to seeing where it takes him.
Chat.zh: 气球僵尸完全不知道自己的气球是从哪来的，但他很喜欢带着这气球，因为他也很喜欢气球带着他。

Introduction.en: The newspaper protects zombie, who is then enraged when it is destroyed.
Introduction.zh: 受到报纸保护的僵尸，当报纸被毁坏时将会发飙。

DESCRIPTION.en: becomes a flighty zombie once the newspaper is destroyed
DESCRIPTION.zh: 一旦报纸被毁，将会发了疯似的向前冲去

Chat.en: You can't really blame him for getting so upset; he was THIS close to finishing the crossword (23 down was "Brains").
Chat.zh: 难怪他总是不高兴，他就差一点就能完成填字游戏了（23 列是单词 “Brains”）。

Introduction.en: The heavy magazine protects zombie, who is then enraged when it is destroyed.
Introduction.zh: 受到厚重杂志保护的僵尸，当报纸被毁坏时将会发飙。

DESCRIPTION.en: becomes a flighty zombie once the magazine is destroyed
DESCRIPTION.zh: 一旦杂志被毁，将会成为发了疯似的向前冲去

Chat.en: Sunday Edition Zombie REALLY loves the comics section, which is why his rage is so all-consuming when it is torn to tatters before he's finished reading it.
Chat.zh: 周刊僵尸非常喜欢杂志里的漫画，这就是他还没看完漫画就被撕成碎片时怒不可遏的原因。

Introduction.en: A heavy-duty zombie who charges your defensive line.
Introduction.zh: 健壮有力，并且会直接冲向你的防御线。

DESCRIPTION.en: charges like a flighty zombie upon entering the lawn and destroys the first plant he meets
DESCRIPTION.zh: 蓄力飞速冲进草坪，并摧毁遇到的第一株植物

DESCRIPTION.en: slows down and becomes a stiff zombie after tackling a plant
DESCRIPTION.zh: 解决掉一株植物后减速，变得迟缓

Chat.en: All-Star Zombie is a third-round draft pick and shows a lot of promise, but come on, his salary demands are beyond ridiculous. Ten million brains per year? For FIFTY YEARS?
Chat.zh: 全明星僵尸通过了第三轮选秀，并且展现出了非凡的潜力。但是天啊，他提出的薪资简直是太夸张了。每年一千万脑子？而且持续整整 50 年？

Introduction.en: An all-too-enthusiastic imp who explodes with rah-rah-rah fervor.
Introduction.zh: 一个过于狂热的小鬼粉丝，能让内心的狂热彻底爆发出来。

Chat.en: Super-Fan Imp has season tickets, subscribes to the team newsletter, and is super pumped about exploding on contact with fans of the opposing team.
Chat.zh: 狂热粉丝小鬼买到了季票，订阅了球队资讯，与对方球迷一接触就会爆发，完全无法自控。

Introduction.en: A technological marvel from the great white north, Zomboni ices over your lawn into a barren wasteland.
Introduction.zh: 作为来自加拿大冰雪地带的科技之光，造冰车僵尸让你的前院被冰雪覆盖，变成一方废土。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 碾压植物

DESCRIPTION.en: creates an ice trail behind it
DESCRIPTION.zh: 在身后形成冰道

Chat.en:
Introducing the Zomboni - the coolest undead on wheels! Caution: Not your typical ice resurfacer. We repeat, NOT a Zamboni® brand ice resurfacing machine!
This frozen fiend from the north will turn your lawn into a slippery slope of doom faster than you can say "brain freeze!"
Chat.zh:
这就是造冰车僵尸——最冷酷的驾驶者！注意：不是你想的那种普普通通的四轮制冰机。重复一遍，不是 Zamboni® 商标的制冰机！
这个来自北方的冰术恶魔能在你喊出“脑结冰了！”之前把你的前院变成冰封地狱！

Introduction.en: Catapult Zombie can lob basketballs over wall type plants with deadly accuracy, making it a serious threat.
Introduction.zh: 投石车僵尸跨过前方的植物，以致命的精准度向后排的植物投掷篮球，是不可小觑的威胁。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants while driving down the lawn
DESCRIPTION.zh: 前进时碾压植物

DESCRIPTION.en: lobs projectiles at the last plant in the lane
DESCRIPTION.zh: 向每一行最后排的植物投掷篮球

Chat.en: Even with two ZCorp factories producing basketballs around the clock, there never seems to be enough.
Chat.zh: 即使 Z 公司的两家工厂共同参与了篮球的生产制造，这些篮球也总是被一下子卖光。

Introduction.en: Regular mummified zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普普通通的干尸。

Chat.en: Is he a mummy? Is he a zombie? It turns out he's a zombie who's rolled himself in toilet paper to protect his fair skin. True fact!
Chat.zh: 他是干尸？还是僵尸？事实上他只是不小心把纸巾缠在身上了。这倒是真的。

Introduction.en: His cobra cone headdress makes him twice tougher than normal mummies.
Introduction.zh: 他的眼镜蛇路障头饰使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: Conehead Mummy Zombie prefers the circular cone shape over the typical pyramid shape. It's a fashion thing, and Conehead Mummy Zombie always stays ahead of fashion.
Chat.zh: 相对于金字塔这样经典的四棱锥，路障木乃伊更喜欢圆锥。这可是潮流中的潮流，而路障木乃伊总是会保持着前卫。

Introduction.en: His sandy bucket greatly protects him from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他那沾满沙子的铁桶使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: Buckethead Mummy Zombie graduated Magna Zom Louder from Zombie Academy where he learned to utilize his diaphragm during groaning lessons.
Chat.zh: 铁桶木乃伊在大僵吼学院毕业，他在吼叫课程中学会了利用自己的膈肌发音。

Introduction.en: His pyramid-shaped headgear provides triangular noggin protection.
Introduction.zh: 他那金字塔形的头盔，让他得到了三角，或者说三维立体的保护。

Chat.en: Pyramid-Head Mummy isn't aware that his pyramid is pyramid-shaped. He's a little slow in that respect.
Chat.zh: 金字塔头木乃伊并不清楚他的金字塔是金字塔形状的。他在这方面还欠缺一些理解能力。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge sandy "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 他的到来预示着一大波僵尸即将在此“翻沙覆地”。

Chat.en: Flag Mummy Zombie is so far behind he thinks he's in first place. He's clearly living in de-Nile.
Chat.zh: 旗帜木乃伊一直以为自己身居高位。实际上他“高得”几乎能探出尼罗河的河床了。

Introduction.en: He celebrates with increased vigor and truculence the arrival of a new wave of bandaged baddies.
Introduction.zh: 他以更旺盛的精力和更粗暴的方式庆祝一大波缠着绷带的亡灵的到来。

Chat.en: Sometimes, a regular Flag Mummy Zombie simply isn't enough to inspire the desired amount of terror and disgust. In these instances, upgrading to the Egypt Rally Zombie isn't the sensible choice, it's the only choice.
Chat.zh: 有时，普通的旗帜木乃伊僵尸根本无法唤出数量可观的恐怖和死尸。在这种情况下，升级到木乃伊大动员不仅是最明智的选择，更是唯一的选择。

Introduction.en: Tries to steal sun, just for safe keeping.
Introduction.zh: 尝试偷走阳光，但也仅仅是暂时保存。

DESCRIPTION.en: tries to steal sun
DESCRIPTION.zh: 会尝试偷走阳光

Chat.en: Ra Zombie isn't actually named after the Sun God Ra, though that's a common mistake. He just likes to say "Ra" a lot.
Chat.zh: 太阳神并不是因为他是太阳神而被叫做太阳神，那只是一个误会。他只是很喜欢赞美太阳罢了。

Introduction.en: Arrives in step with other Camel Zombies.
Introduction.zh: 随着其他的骆驼牌僵尸组队入场。

DESCRIPTION.en: arrives in a group of three zombies or more
DESCRIPTION.zh: 每组三名或以上同时到来

Chat.en: Each Camel Zombie is an excellent ballroom dancer, practicing every day by holding up mysterious signs with strange symbols. They call it "The Camel Dance".
Chat.zh: 每名骆驼牌僵尸都是舞厅中出色的舞者，每天举着带有神秘图案的牌子排练。他们称之为“骆驼舞”。

Introduction.en: Carries a torch that can instantly destroy your plants.
Introduction.zh: 手持能秒杀你的植物的火把。

DESCRIPTION.en: torch destroys a plant on contact
DESCRIPTION.zh: 火把迅速烧毁接触到的植物

DESCRIPTION.en: cold attacks extinguish torch
DESCRIPTION.zh: 冰冻攻击能使火把熄灭

Chat.en: His impressive friendly mutton chops has always kept food in them for weeks, making sure his explorations are filled with snacks.
Chat.zh: 他那柔和的连鬓胡子总是能藏着存放了几个星期的食物，这使他在探索时有源源不断的零食享用。

Introduction.en: Carries a torch that instantly destroys plants and scorches the earth.
Introduction.zh: 手持能秒杀你的植物的火把，让你的阵型烧出一个窟窿。

DESCRIPTION.en: torch destroys a plant on contact
DESCRIPTION.zh: 火把迅速烧毁接触到的植物

DESCRIPTION.en: cold attacks extinguish torch
DESCRIPTION.zh: 冰冻攻击能使火把熄灭

Chat.en: Torchlight Zombie has no fear of the dark. That's not because he's always got a torch, however, but rather because as a zombie he has no capacity for fear in the first place.
Chat.zh: 火光僵尸不惧黑暗，并不是因为他总是拿着个火把，而是因为僵尸从一开始就不具有害怕的能力。

Introduction.en: Throws out bones to create tombstones.
Introduction.zh: 丢出能产生墓碑的骨头。

DESCRIPTION.en: creates tombstones on the lawn
DESCRIPTION.zh: 在草坪上制造墓碑

Chat.en: He dreams about playing fetch, running for brains. He loves burying himself in the yard, and is not yet indoor trained. He's still looking for his tail.
Chat.zh: 他梦想着能玩丢脑子捡脑子的游戏，他也喜欢把自己埋在后院里，甚至还没经历过室内训练，他还在找他的尾巴。

Introduction.en: His sarcophagus greatly protects him but slows down a rather fast zombie.
Introduction.zh: 他那精心雕刻过的石棺极大程度地保护了他，但是让原本步伐迅猛的他变得迟缓。

DESCRIPTION.en: moves like a hungry zombie once free
DESCRIPTION.zh: 一旦被释放出来，将会饿虎扑食般前进

Chat.en: The second cousin once removed of King Rot, he rose to power with his disappearing sarcophagus act, but met his untimely end in an unfortunate goat accident. His tale is told in great detail on the back of his sarcophagus, which no one will ever see.
Chat.zh: 他以前是“腐王”的隔代堂兄，曾把自己藏在法老石棺中，这样他就是王了，但是很不幸他最后死于这场史上最冤屈的意外。他的经历被详细地刻在了石棺里面，尽管没人能够知晓。

Introduction.en: Thrown over most of your defenses, then slinks onward.
Introduction.zh: 被抛出并越过你的防线，然后向前方溜走。

Chat.en: Imp Mummy prefers to laze around the tomb, hop up on the urns, and stratch at the sarcophagi. The sound of him coughing up a hairball is one you will never forget.
Chat.zh: 木乃伊小鬼喜欢靠着墓碑消磨时光，跳到瓦瓮上，或者把石棺挠花。他吐毛球的声音保证能让你终生难忘。

Introduction.en: Massive zombie from a royal line of mummies.
Introduction.zh: 王室木乃伊中最巨大的那一位。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with sarcophagus
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用石棺摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: launches Imp Mummy when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时丢出木乃伊小鬼

Chat.en: True Fact #1: The pyramids were built in an attempt to make Mummified Gargantuar seem small. It didn't work. True Fact #2: The Sphinx isn't missing its nose... that is the face of... Gargantuar.
Chat.zh: 事实 No.1：金字塔的建造是为了显得干巨尸没那么大，但没啥效果。事实 No.2：狮身人面像并没有丢掉鼻子......那是......巨尸的脸。

Introduction.en: Massive zombie from a royal line of mummies.
Introduction.zh: 王室木乃伊中最巨大的那一位。

DESCRIPTION.en: missile attack can create tombstones
DESCRIPTION.zh: 导弹爆炸时可以生成墓碑

Chat.en: To add that extra bit of wickedness to the Sphinx-inator Dr. Zomboss chiseled his creation from the stonework of cursed tombs. You should not take this instance of reuse and recycle to mean he's going green. The only thing green about him is his tongue.
Chat.zh: 为了给狮身人面降临者增加一分邪恶感，僵尸博士用被诅咒的墓碑雕刻出了这份作品。千万别以为他这么做是为了绿色环保。但别误会，他确实能为沙漠带来绿色，你问怎么做到的？当他把话锋指向你的时候你的脸就会被吓成那个颜色！

Introduction.en: Regular plank walking zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普普通通像日常一样在甲板上游荡的僵尸。

Chat.en: Keeping up with the latest pirate trends is always tricky, but remember, he was planking before it was cool.
Chat.zh: 跟上海盗的最新潮流总是很麻烦，但是记住，他们天天玩的趴板挑战那时甚至还没开始流行呢。

Introduction.en: His Jolly Roger cone makes him twice tougher than normal pirates.
Introduction.zh: 他那海盗旗装饰的路障使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: Conehead Pirate is a simple zombie. When asked what his favorite dish is, he'd think for a moment, straighten his ascot, and say, "Rrurrarrbrains". Perhaps he could borrow a cup, neighbor?
Chat.zh: 路障海盗是个很朴素的僵尸，当被问起最喜欢的食物是什么时，他会思考一阵子，拉一下他的领带，然后说道，“脑脑脑脑脑子”。也许你可以借给他一颗，对吧邻居？

Introduction.en: His sturdy wooden bucket provides excellent protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他头上的铁箍木桶使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: Buckethead Pirate is looking for his bucket. Have you seen it? It's where? Up where? Speak up, he can't hear you.
Chat.zh: 铁桶海盗正在寻找着他的桶。你看到过吗？在哪？你是说叫他看头顶上？哦，他已经听不见了。

Introduction.en: Barrelhead Zombie's keg-like hat provides augmented protection.
Introduction.zh: 木桶头海盗的酒桶头盔提供了强大的保护。

Chat.en: Dredged from the deepest of seas, Barrelhead Pirate's barrel is a high-quality cask that fits just a bit too snugly.
Chat.zh: 木桶头海盗的木桶是从最深的海底打捞而来的，是工艺精湛的橡木桶，只不过有点太紧了。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge salty "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波浑身腥味的僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: A zombie that needs no introduction.
Chat.zh: 这只僵尸不需要任何介绍。

Introduction.en: Rally Roger Zombie marks the arrival of lots and lots of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 大动员海盗旗僵尸的出现代表着一大大大大群的僵尸的来临。

Chat.en: Rally Roger Zombie and his flag are fused into a single brain-munching unit. Their teamwork is an inspiration to ghouls everywhere.
Chat.zh: 大动员海盗旗僵尸和他的旗帜融合形成一个只知道啃食脑子的个体。他们的合作关系不论在哪振奋尸心。

Introduction.en: Swings in on a rope to lane midway onto your lawn.
Introduction.zh: 抓着荡索进入草坪的中央。

DESCRIPTION.en: lands four tiles into your lawn
DESCRIPTION.zh: 直接越过四格进入你的草坪

Chat.en: He swashes. He buckles. But, he also writes home every third Sunday and sends brains and treasure via post. He's a good zombie at heart.
Chat.zh: 他喜欢摇荡，也喜欢绳索。但是他也会每个月第三个星期六给家里寄信，还会邮寄一些脑子。他打心里是一名好僵尸。

Introduction.en: Crosses watery gaps without a plank and flies over low plants.
Introduction.zh: 无需甲板即可飞跃水路，还能跨过低矮植物。

DESCRIPTION.en: passes over low plants like spikeweed and iceberg lettuce
DESCRIPTION.zh: 无视地刺或冰冻生菜这样的低矮植物

Chat.en: Seagull Zombie has racked up the frequent flier miles and dreams of going to the top of colleges in the world on a cerebral gastronomy vacation.
Chat.zh: 海鸥僵尸积累了丰富的飞行经验，并梦想着趁着假期期间登上世界最一流的脑美食研究大学。

Introduction.en: Pelican Zombie crosses water without a plank and flies over low plants.
Introduction.zh: 鹈鹕僵尸无需甲板即可飞跃水路，还能跨过低矮植物。

DESCRIPTION.en: floats over low plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 无视低矮植物

Chat.en: The Pelican Zombie upgraded from the Seagull Zombie and has no regrets. No egrets, either. Just a pelican.
Chat.zh: 鹈鹕僵尸毫不后悔自己得到了进化。当然不是进化论中的进化，只是换成鹈鹕而已。

Introduction.en: His rolling barrel crushes plants and provides excellent protection.
Introduction.zh: 他通过推桶来碾压植物，还能得到保护。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with barrel
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用滚筒碾压植物

DESCRIPTION.en: imps thrown from barrel when destroyed
DESCRIPTION.zh: 当桶被打碎时，小鬼会从桶中跳出

Chat.en: Barrel Roller Zombie is part of a super underground secret awesome club. You probably haven't heard about it. Also, his left arm is slightly longer than his right arm.
Chat.zh: 滚筒僵尸是地下超级神秘帅气俱乐部的一员，你可能哈还没听说过吧。另外，他的左手比右手长一点点。

Introduction.en: Shoots Pirate Imps past your defenses. Eventually it can explode and rain down imps.
Introduction.zh: 发射出海盗小鬼，越过你的防线。一段时间后爆炸并投掷出一大群小鬼。

DESCRIPTION.en: fires imps to mid-lawn
DESCRIPTION.zh: 向草坪中央射出小鬼

DESCRIPTION.en: explodes into a shower of imps if not destroyed quickly
DESCRIPTION.zh: 未被即使处理则会炸膛迸发出一群小鬼

Chat.en: The Imps joined the Order of the Cannon Fraternity, Kappa Pea, and quickly rose through the ranks due to constant firing of their leadership.
Chat.zh: 这些小鬼们加入了“大炮兄弟经验会”“河童豆”。他们总能因为踢飞老大而不断晋升。

Introduction.en: His parrot can fly away with your plant and then return to him.
Introduction.zh: 他的鹦鹉会把你的植物偷走，然后回到他头顶。

DESCRIPTION.en: parrot pet steals plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 宠物鹦鹉能偷走植物

Chat.en: Pirate Captain Zombie isn't actually a captain. His dry cleaning got mixed with someone else's, but he thought he looked cool with an eyepatch. Plus, the parrot already knew his name, so he just went with it.
Chat.zh: 海盗船长僵尸并不是真正的船长。他干洗的衣服和别人的混到一起了，但他还是认为自己有个眼罩很酷。另外，这只鹦鹉知道他的名字，所以他总是会跟着这只鹦鹉。

Introduction.en: Quickly flies from the Captain to carry away a plant.
Introduction.zh: 快速从船长的头顶飞出，抓走一株植物。

DESCRIPTION.en: can fly to plants in other lanes to take them away
DESCRIPTION.zh: 可跨行飞向并偷走植物

Chat.en: He's a third generation aviation revolutionary. He wants to serve his pirate brethren like his father and his grandmother, Salty Anne, before him.
Chat.zh: 他造就了第三代飞行革新。他愿意效忠自己的海盗同伙们，就像他的父亲和祖母安妮·咸卫那样。

Introduction.en: Prefers the compact space of barrels, both cannon and rolling.
Introduction.zh: 喜欢木桶或炮膛这样的密闭空间。

Chat.en: He was a bootblack, with a side trade as a pickpocket on the streets of London, but all hestole were oversized footwear. "Time to steal some booty!" was his catchphrase.
Chat.zh: 他是个擦鞋匠，在伦敦街头兼营扒手行当，但只偷超大尺码的鞋。“是时候搞点宝贝了！”是他的口头禅。

Introduction.en: Enormous zombie who redefines the shark attack.
Introduction.zh: 巨大到能重新定义什么叫鲨鱼攻击。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with shark
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用鲨鱼摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: fires off Pirate Imp when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时射出海盗小鬼

Chat.en: Gargantuar Pirate likes short walks off the plank, moonlit raiding parties, and the smell of cannon fire. A true romantic.
Chat.zh: 海盗巨尸喜欢小步走甲板、月光下的掠夺派对，还有炮筒里的硝烟味。一个真正的浪漫主义者。

Introduction.en: The plant plundering privateer of the high seas.
Introduction.zh: 专门公海私掠植物的武装海盗船。

DESCRIPTION.en: cannon can rain down imps past your defenses
DESCRIPTION.zh: 藏有能散射大量小鬼的大炮

Chat.en: "Hoist the mizzemast, batten down the hatches! 15 zombies on a dead man's boat, yo ho ho and a bucket of brains!" Dr. Zomboss had to admit he was really getting into this whole pirate thing. Though he never thought he'd be on a boat on a boat.
Chat.zh: “桅杆升起来！舱门封死了！十五只僵尸在幽灵船上——哟吼吼，再开一桶新鲜的脑浆！”不得不承认，僵尸博士已经迷上了海盗的魅力。即使他没想到过会登上一艘海盗船上的海盗船。

Introduction.en: Regular rootin' tootin' cowboy zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普通但活得风光的牛仔僵尸。

Chat.en: Cowboy Zombie thinks he's the roughest, toughest, meanest zombie varmint in the west, south, and east. He's anxious to test his skills in the central coast region.
Chat.zh: 牛仔僵尸认为自己是整个西部最难缠、最健硕、最残酷的僵尸，南部也是，东部也是。因为他没胆子去中部跟别人较量。

Introduction.en: His cowhide cone gives him twice the toughness more than regular cowboys.
Introduction.zh: 他的牛皮路障使他变得比普通的牛仔抗打两倍。

Chat.en: The sheriff of these here parts. Please pull over the horse and pull out your driver's license, registration, and proof of brains.
Chat.zh: 我是本地的警官，请你们把马牵好，掏出你们的驾驶照，交出有脑子的证明。

Introduction.en: His chili pot hat makes him greatly resistant to damage.
Introduction.zh: 他头上的带着辣味的铁锅使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: A five-time winner of the temporal chili cook-off. Those Egyptian zombies don't know their chili, but Cowboys love their beans. The more you eat, the more you brains.
Chat.zh: 最辣辣椒油烹饪比赛的五连胜者，那些埃及的僵尸不知道他们用了辣椒，但是牛仔们喜欢本地的辣豆子。吃得越多，辣的越晕。

Introduction.en: Cart-head Cowboy's cart-shaped chapeau provides extra-wheeled head protection.
Introduction.zh: 矿车头牛仔的矿车帽子提供了四轮保护。

Chat.en: Cart-head Cowboy could probably move a lot faster if he did a handstand and rolled, but he's not thinking that far ahead.
Chat.zh: 加入矿车头牛仔倒立前进的话可能可以走得快得多了，但他根本想不出这么先进的办法。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge dusty "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波满身尘土的僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: The Lone Brainer leads the way.
Chat.zh: 带路的独脑侠。

Introduction.en: Cowboy Rally Zombie marks the arrival of a sizable stampede of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 大动员牛仔代表着浩浩荡荡的僵尸的来临。

Chat.en: Arrows point to the brain on Cowboy Rally's Flag, as if to say, "Hey, everyone, I would like to emphasize this image." It's canny design.
Chat.zh: 大动员牛仔旗帜上的箭头指着脑子，就好像是在告诉大家，“喂，大伙，你们看得见吗，这个图片？看得见吗，喂？”真是精明的设计。

Introduction.en: Launches over your defenses when his fuse blows down.
Introduction.zh: 会被自己的炸药发射并越过所有植物。

DESCRIPTION.en: appears on the left side of your lawn when dynamite explodes
DESCRIPTION.zh: 炸药爆炸后会落在草坪的最左侧

Chat.en: "There once was a zombie who got old, spending all his day looking for gold. 'Til one day in the rain, he finally ate the brains… and, wait, where's his other shoe?"
Chat.zh: “曾经有个僵尸，找到了黄金，于是此后他花费所有的时间寻找黄金。直到某个雨天，他终于吃光了身上携带的脑子……然后，等等，他的另一只鞋哪去了？”

Introduction.en: His rolling piano crushes plants while his music causes dancing zombies to switch lanes.
Introduction.zh: 行进的钢琴会碾压植物，弹奏的音乐让跳舞的僵尸在行间穿梭。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with piano
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用钢琴碾压植物

DESCRIPTION.en: causes cowboy zombies to switch lanes
DESCRIPTION.zh: 使牛仔僵尸们开始舞蹈换行

Chat.en: Pianist Zombie only knows two songs, and they're both groaners.
Chat.zh: 奏琴僵尸只知道两手曲子，而且歌词都是吼叫。

Introduction.en: Sometimes has a hidden armored plate.
Introduction.zh: 有时候斗篷里藏着一个坚硬的锅炉。

DESCRIPTION.en: randomly wears a protective metal grate
DESCRIPTION.zh: 可能携带着有保护效果的金属锅炉

Chat.en: The grate is his most prized possession. The poncho is there just to protect it from getting rusty. Also, he's looking for his mechanical horse.
Chat.zh: 这个锅炉是他最珍视的财产。斗篷只是为了保护它以免生锈。另外，他正在寻找他的机械马。

Introduction.en: Releases a flock of chickens once his baling wire is broken.
Introduction.zh: 身上的防盗网被打破时释放一大群鸡。

DESCRIPTION.en: summons zombie chickens when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受伤一定程度会释放一群僵尸鸡

Chat.en: After publishing the fourth study on Ornithology, and four years of research at the Hadron Collider, Chicken Wrangler Zombie has finally solved the riddle of what came first.
Chat.zh: 在鸟类学领域发布了第四次研究报告，并且在强子对撞机领域研究了四年时间后，牧鸡僵尸终于搞明白了哪个能先被完成。

Introduction.en: Once released onto the lawn chickens run at full speed to peck at your brains.
Introduction.zh: 一旦挣脱束缚，他们将会全力冲向你的大脑。

Chat.en: Ba-qwack!
Chat.zh: 咯咯咯！

Introduction.en: Can launch his zombie rider past most of your defenses.
Introduction.zh: 能将身上的牛骑手投出并越过你的大部分防线。

DESCRIPTION.en: launches a low flying imp rider over plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 低空丢出一只小鬼，越过植物

DESCRIPTION.en: Tall-nut blocks flying imp
DESCRIPTION.zh: 高坚果能挡住飞出的小鬼

Chat.en: He's not an angry bull. He loves flowers, playing in the fields, sitting in the trees, and long walks across the pasture. He wants to settle down when he meets the right cow. Too bad he's a robot.
Chat.zh: 它不是一只暴躁的牛。它喜欢花草，喜欢在田野间玩耍，在树底下歇息，在草场间闲逛。他希望和合适的另一半成家。但很可惜他是个机器。

Introduction.en: Rodeo Legend smashes a plant and launches his zombie rider past most of your defenses.
Introduction.zh: 骑牛竞技传奇击溃一株植物，并将身上的牛骑手投出越过你的大部分防线。

DESCRIPTION.en: smashes the first plant he meets while rushing
DESCRIPTION.zh: 冲刺时撞死遇到的第一株植物

DESCRIPTION.en: launches a low flying imp rider over plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 低空丢出一只小鬼，越过植物

DESCRIPTION.en: Tall-nut blocks flying imp
DESCRIPTION.zh: 高坚果能挡住飞出的小鬼

Chat.en: "Legend" perhaps overstates Rodeo Legend's status in the rodeo world. Don't tell him that, though, unless you're desperate to hear an hour-long tirade about calf-roping.
Chat.zh: “传奇”这个词，在骑牛竞赛界用来形容骑牛竞技传奇或许过于夸张。别让他听到了，不然你会绝望地听他那长达一小时关于犊牛的演讲。

Introduction.en: Gets launched past all but the tallest plants, then proceeds on foot.
Introduction.zh: 被丢出时越过所有比他矮的植物，之后步行前进。

Chat.en: Had dreams of becoming a rodeo clown but found the clown make-up to just be too creepy.
Chat.zh: 梦想过成为一个牛仔小丑，但不由得发觉小丑的化妆太过令人毛骨悚然。

Introduction.en: Humongous zombie with brand awareness.
Introduction.zh: 手持烙铁武器的巨型僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with brand
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用烙铁摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: launches Bull Rider when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时丢出牛骑手

Chat.en: Likes candy.
Chat.zh: 喜欢糖果。

Introduction.en: The stagecoach of destruction from the western wilds.
Introduction.zh: 狂野西部中最具有毁灭性力量的马车。

DESCRIPTION.en: missile attacks can target mine carts
DESCRIPTION.zh: 导弹能瞄准矿车

DESCRIPTION.en: fires four missiles at most instead of one
DESCRIPTION.zh: 每次发射最多四颗导弹，而不是一颗

Chat.en: Ranchers and farmhands, abandon your fields. Rumbling down the dusty trail, this wagon was engineered to strike fear into the heart of any horticulturist who should encounter it. Dr. Zomboss normally doesn't take any bull, but this time he made an exception.
Chat.zh: 牧场主与农民们，别管你们的田地了！这辆战车正沿尘烟滚滚的小道轰鸣而来——专为击溃任何种植者的心理防线而设计。僵尸博士向来不屑于斗牛的战术，但这次，他破例搬来了一只。

Introduction.en: Regular Kongfu studying zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普通的正在学习武术的僵尸。

Chat.en: Don't underestimate these Kongfu Zombies, they’ve been learning kongfu for years, having had it forgotten though.
Chat.zh: 别小看这些普通僵尸，他们好歹也学了许多年功夫，尽管已经全都忘了。

Introduction.en: His ink painting decorated cone makes him twice tougher than normal zombies.
Introduction.zh: 他的水墨画装饰路障使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: Why does Kongfu Zombie need cones for protection? The answer is that it makes them fashionable.
Chat.zh: 为什么功夫僵尸还需要路障作为保护？答案是，这样显得比较时髦。

Introduction.en: His iron kettle headwear provides great protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他的铁壶头盔使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: Don't get it wrong, he just used to try performing acrobatics involving a kettle on the head.
Chat.zh: 不要误会，他原本只是想尝试头顶茶壶的杂技。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge noisy "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波吵吵闹闹的僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: Flag Zombie is born a leader, so he doesn't need to know Kongfu, just knowing how to wave the flag is enough.
Chat.zh: 旗帜僵尸是天生的领导者，因此他不需要会功夫，只需要会舞旗即可。

Introduction.en: Kongfu Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a large crew of skilled zombies.
Introduction.zh: 武斗大动员僵尸和他的旗帜代表着超大群身怀绝技僵尸的来临。

Chat.en: Kongfu Rally Zombie can even use his flag as a weapon.
Chat.zh: 武斗大动员僵尸甚至能用他的旗帜作为武器。

Introduction.en: Hammer Zombie rotates when a projectile hits him while walking.
Introduction.zh: 捶鼓僵尸被直射子弹击中时开始旋转。

DESCRIPTION.en: rotates and returns projectiles that are shot straightly ahead
DESCRIPTION.zh: 旋转并反弹直射过来的子弹

Chat.en: Every joint between his bones can rotate with ease — given by years of hammer-swinging practice.
Chat.zh: 他身上的所有关节都能自由旋转，这可是常年用巧劲连续捶鼓积累出来的。

Introduction.en: Carries a torch that can instantly destroy your plants.
Introduction.zh: 手持能秒杀你的植物的火把。

DESCRIPTION.en: torch destroys a plant on contact
DESCRIPTION.zh: 火把迅速烧毁接触到的植物

DESCRIPTION.en: cold attacks extinguish torch
DESCRIPTION.zh: 冰冻攻击能使火把熄灭

Chat.en: He thought he's traveling between Shaolin Temples. In fact, everyday he just walks around one of the mountains and returns to where he starts.
Chat.zh: 他以为自己在不同少林寺间游学。实际上，每天他都只是绕着山走了一圈又回来了。

Introduction.en: Carries a torch that can instantly destroy your plants.
Introduction.zh: 手持能秒杀你的植物的火把。

DESCRIPTION.en: torch destroys a plant on contact
DESCRIPTION.zh: 火把迅速烧毁接触到的植物

DESCRIPTION.en: breathes fire towards plants that are close enough, dealing deadly damages
DESCRIPTION.zh: 向接近的植物吐出火焰，造成大量伤害

DESCRIPTION.en: cold attacks extinguish torch
DESCRIPTION.zh: 冰冻攻击能使火把熄灭

Chat.en: Not even should the cook of the Kongfu Temple be underestimated.
Chat.zh: 即使他是少林寺的伙夫，其实力也不容小觑。

Introduction.en: Fans out Qigong storms.
Introduction.zh: 扇出气功飓风。

DESCRIPTION.en: Qigong storm pushes walking zombies forward
DESCRIPTION.zh: 气功飓风会将行走的僵尸向前推

Chat.en: If utilized well, Qigong is a perfect transport method. Though it's much more tiring than carrying on their own...
Chat.zh: 合理利用的话，气功会是完美的运输手段。尽管这比用双手搬运累得多……

Introduction.en: Leaps above your defences and returns most of the projectiles in an area.
Introduction.zh: 越过你的防线，并且将周围的子弹尽数反弹。

DESCRIPTION.en: leaps above the plants that survive from his staff-attack
DESCRIPTION.zh: 承受住其棍击的植物会被他越过

DESCRIPTION.en: can be blocked by Tall-nuts
DESCRIPTION.zh: 会被高坚果阻挡

DESCRIPTION.en: returns projectiles in an area across 3 lanes
DESCRIPTION.zh: 反弹三行范围内自身附近的所有子弹

DESCRIPTION.en: cannot reach the projectiles from Cantaloupe-pults
DESCRIPTION.zh: 无法够到哈密瓜投手的子弹

Chat.en: You thought that the Abbots are only capable with Qigong? Stop underestimating them!
Chat.zh: 以为住持们只会玩弄气功吗？太轻敌了！

Introduction.en: Fires Qigong blasts towards your plants.
Introduction.zh: 向植物发动气功波。

DESCRIPTION.en: Qigong blast pushes your plants on contact
DESCRIPTION.zh: 气功波会推开接触到的植物

DESCRIPTION.en: Resistant Radishes block off Qigong blasts
DESCRIPTION.zh: 白萝卜会抵挡气功波

Chat.en: As the true successor of The leader of the Big Three and inheritor of the Qigong Cult, he travels between different Kongfu Temples to teach Qigong, though he is often mistaken for a leaf-sweeping monk.
Chat.zh: 作为武林三巨头一把手的真传弟子，即气功教的传人，他在各个少林寺之间往返传授气功教，尽管经常被当成扫地僧去清扫落叶。

Introduction.en: Becomes enraged after drinking
Introduction.zh: 喝酒后，能进入狂暴状态。

DESCRIPTION.en: becomes resistant, powerful and speedy after drinking
DESCRIPTION.zh: 喝酒后，抵抗力上升，伤害更高，走得更快

DESCRIPTION.en: drinks when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤后饮酒

Chat.en: As a bad news, Drinking Zombie learned drunken boxing, while the good news is, that he only learned how to make a fist.
Chat.zh: 坏消息是，醉酒僵尸学过醉拳！好消息是，他只学会了握拳。

Introduction.en: Gets enraged when damaged, making you pay for defying him.
Introduction.zh: 重伤后会暴走，让你知道藐视他的代价。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with wolfsbane
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用狼牙棒摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: enrages and speeds up when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时暴怒并加速前进

Chat.en: Bronze of Toughness is filled with endless power.
Chat.zh: 大汉铜人浑身充满无尽的力量。

Introduction.en: Occasionally summons other kongfu zombies, or pulls all the plants ahead with qigong.
Introduction.zh: 偶尔召唤其他功夫僵尸，或用气功拉动身前的植物。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with his Buddhist staff
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用禅杖砸毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: uses qigong to pull all the plants ahead
DESCRIPTION.zh: 能发动气功，吸收身前的所有植物

DESCRIPTION.en: summons kongfu zombies
DESCRIPTION.zh: 召唤功夫僵尸

Chat.en: Bronze of Qigong acts like he's one of the eight Vajrapanis, due to his endeavor spending his whole life meditating.
Chat.zh: 气功铜人的表现已经达到八大金刚的级别，归功于他耗尽一生的冥想。

Introduction.en: Occasionally leaps to the lanes with least plants guarding.
Introduction.zh: 偶尔跳跃到植物最少的行上。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with his iron hook
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用铁钩砸毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: leaps to the lanes with least plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 跳跃到植物最少的行上

Chat.en: The hardest part of his practicing is untying the chains quickly. He always broke them up.
Chat.zh: 他训练中最困难的一环是快速解开铁锁，他总是把铁链绷断。

Introduction.en: The first of the Big Three to arrive at your lawn, leading an army of kongfu zombies.
Introduction.zh: 最先到访你的前院的武林巨头，引领着所有武斗僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: lobbed bombs destroy plants in a 3x3 area if their targets are not shoveled in time
DESCRIPTION.zh: 如果没能及时铲除目标，丢出的炸弹将摧毁 3x3 范围内的植物

DESCRIPTION.en: summon Rocket Imps, both launched from the right and lobbed from his back
DESCRIPTION.zh: 从背后丢出或从场外召唤出火箭小鬼

Chat.en: As the third-in-command of the Big Three, Devil of Dynamite excels in diplomacy. Dr.Zomboss took advantage of this, forging an alliance with all the zombies at Kongfu Temple, and even developing a new method to open a space-time portal.
Chat.zh: 作为武林三巨头的三把手，火药魔头最擅长外交。僵尸博士利用这一点与少林寺的所有僵尸达成共识，甚至研究出打开时空大门的新方法。

Introduction.en: The second of the Big Three to arrive at your lawn, leading an army of kongfu zombies.
Introduction.zh: 第二位到访你的前院的武林巨头，引领着大量的武僧和武斗僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: blocks off all damages on while his blade is flying across your defence
DESCRIPTION.zh: 在把大刀丢向你的防线期间，会将所有伤害吸收

Chat.en: As the second-in-command of the Big Three, Blade-Wielding Hero has a slight grasp of qigong. He often infuses his weapons with qigong to strengthen his control over them, acting like "man and weapon in one".
Chat.zh: 作为武林三巨头的二把手，持刀大侠稍微会一点气功。经常把气功注入到他的武器中加强自己对武器的掌控，到达“人兵合一”的领域。

Introduction.en: Becomes enraged after drinking
Introduction.zh: 喝酒后，能进入狂暴状态。

DESCRIPTION.en: becomes resistant, powerful and speedy after drinking
DESCRIPTION.zh: 喝酒后，抵抗力上升，伤害更高，走得更快

DESCRIPTION.en: drinks when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤后饮酒

Chat.en: As long as he's undefeatable, he can ignore any rules for monks.
Chat.zh: 实力够强则可无视戒规。

Introduction.en: Ignites the bomb on contact and explodes, dealing deadly damage to all plants in an area.
Introduction.zh: 碰到植物后，能引爆手里的炸弹，对大范围植物造成致命伤害。

DESCRIPTION.en: explodes and damages heavily to nearby plants on contact
DESCRIPTION.zh: 碰到植物自爆并对范围内植物造成巨量伤害

DESCRIPTION.en: loses his bomb when his arm is broken
DESCRIPTION.zh: 断手后丢掉炸弹

DESCRIPTION.en: bomb expires when chilled
DESCRIPTION.zh: 炸弹受冷后熄灭

Chat.en: Bomb Zombie has little facilities in kongfu, making him embarrassed staying with other kongfu learners. He's humble until he found his talent in pyrotechnic.
Chat.zh: 自爆僵尸没有武功天分, 所以他一直很自卑地待在少林寺, 直到他发现了自己的火药天分后, 地位骤升。

Introduction.en: Bangs his gong and summons Bomb Zombies.
Introduction.zh: 敲击铜锣，召唤自爆僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: summons Bomb Zombies
DESCRIPTION.zh: 召唤自爆僵尸

DESCRIPTION.en: cannot play his gong with his arm broken
DESCRIPTION.zh: 断手后不再能敲击铜锣

Chat.en: Gong Zombie is Bomb Zombie's brother, neither of them has access to kongfu. But in difference, Gong Zombie have the talent to play the instruments.
Chat.zh: 铜锣僵尸本是自爆僵尸的兄弟，他们都不会功夫，不同的是，铜锣僵尸对乐器更有兴趣。

Introduction.en: Uses qigong, pulling plants ahead.
Introduction.zh: 能发动气功，吸收身前的所有植物。

DESCRIPTION.en: uses qigong to pull all the plants ahead
DESCRIPTION.zh: 发动气功，吸收身前的所有植物

DESCRIPTION.en: qigong can be canceled when a Resistant Radish is in its way
DESCRIPTION.zh: 气功会被行中的白萝卜打断

Chat.en: When asked why he pulls the plants forward instead of pushing them away, "Maybe our future generations will fulfill our need." Answered Qigong Zombie, "Right now I shall focus on my own destiny."
Chat.zh: 当他被问起为什么要把植物拉过来而不是推出去，“也许我们的子孙后代能实现这一点。”气功僵尸回答道，“现在我们应该专注于我们的使命。”

Introduction.en: Rides a rocket towards your defence and lands on contacting.
Introduction.zh: 骑着火箭径直冲向你的防线，碰到植物时落地。

DESCRIPTION.en: strikes into you lawn until blocked by a plant
DESCRIPTION.zh: 突然冲进你的草坪，直到被植物挡住

DESCRIPTION.en: chilly attacks force him to land, then fire attacks launch him away
DESCRIPTION.zh: 火箭会被冷冻攻击打断，再被火焰攻击点燃时直接离场

Chat.en: He walks fast enough without a rocket, but you know, Imps just dislike regular entrance.
Chat.zh: 他不依靠火箭前进速度已经够快了，但是你懂的，小鬼僵尸很不喜欢以平庸的方式入场。

Introduction.en: Light enough to fly past most of your plants in the air.
Introduction.zh: 身体轻盈，能越过大部分防线。

DESCRIPTION.en: frequently hops up and flies past most of your defences
DESCRIPTION.zh: 经常跳起并悬浮在空中，越过你的大部分植物

DESCRIPTION.en: can be blocked by Tall-nuts while flying
DESCRIPTION.zh: 飞行时会被高坚果阻挡

Chat.en: Qinggong mastery - light as a swallow.
Chat.zh: 掌握了轻功的精髓——身轻如燕。

Introduction.en: A genius that learns Qigong well though he's really young.
Introduction.zh: 年轻的天才，极大程度地掌握气功运用。

DESCRIPTION.en: swiftly enters your lawn and repels all projectiles
DESCRIPTION.zh: 快速进入你的草坪，排开所有的弹射物

Chat.en: He was willing to stand on the front lines. Was it this spirit that made him a genius, or did such talent forge this spirit?
Chat.zh: 他甘愿站在前线，究竟是这种精神让他成为天才，还是他的天赋铸就这种精神？

Introduction.en: Regular but professional Kongfu zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普通但精通武术的僵尸。

Chat.en: Practicing standing poses, squatting, sitting quietly, along with eating brains, they constitute the daily tasks of Monk Zombies.
Chat.zh: 站桩，蹲马步，静坐，外加吃脑子，这些构成了武僧僵尸的每天任务。

Introduction.en: His ink painting decorated cone makes him twice tougher than normal monks.
Introduction.zh: 他的水墨画装饰路障使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: You thought the Monk Zombie doesn't need armors? Nah, in fact, he thought it was a Douli.
Chat.zh: 你以为武僧就不用头戴护甲了吗？你错了，其实他以为那是斗笠。

Introduction.en: His iron kettle headwear provides great protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他的铁壶头盔使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: He not only does Kongfu skill trainings every day, but is also responsible for water heating in the temple.
Chat.zh: 他除了练武，还负责庙里的烧水工作。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge noisy "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波吵吵闹闹的僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: He used to be responsible for the flag-raising ceremony in the temple.
Chat.zh: 他以前就负责堂里的升旗仪式。

Introduction.en: Monk Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a large crew of skilled zombies.
Introduction.zh: 武僧大动员僵尸和他的旗帜代表着超大群身怀绝技僵尸的来临。

Chat.en: You really think he uses the flag as a weapon like Kongfu Rally Zombie did? Come on. Don't ask for more when someone can play it like a flute.
Chat.zh: 你真以为他能像武斗大动员僵尸那样把旗子当武器使？哦天啊，他都能用这支旗子吹笛子了，你还想怎么样呢。

Introduction.en: A Monk Zombie that deals big damage.
Introduction.zh: 拥有超强攻击力的武僧僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: chops plants with his blade
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用大刀对劈砍植物

Chat.en: Powerful, not because of himself, but gravity.
Chat.zh: 力量强大，并不是因为他的臂力，而是因为刀身太重。

Introduction.en: Nunchaku Monk Zombie swings his nunchaku to return projectiles.
Introduction.zh: 双截棍武僧挥动双截棍反弹子弹。

DESCRIPTION.en: swings his nunchaku and returns projectiles that are shot straightly ahead
DESCRIPTION.zh: 挥舞双截棍并反弹直射过来的子弹

Chat.en: According to experiments, a zombie's neck becomes stronger once he knocked his own head off. That'd be meaningful if he could make it to re-install his head.
Chat.zh: 实验表明，僵尸一旦亲自把自己的脑袋砸下来，他的脖子会变得更加健硕。要是他能把自己的头安回去，那可就不得了了。

Introduction.en: Speedily swings a torch that can instantly destroy your plants.
Introduction.zh: 转动火把，秒杀你的植物。

DESCRIPTION.en: torch destroys a plant on contact, including that are short
DESCRIPTION.zh: 火把迅速烧毁接触到的植物，包括低矮植物

DESCRIPTION.en: cold attacks extinguish torch
DESCRIPTION.zh: 冰冻攻击能使火把熄灭

Chat.en: Monks in the Shaolin Temple practice day and night. Thanks to Torch Monk Zombie making everyone think the sun never sets.
Chat.zh: 少林寺的武僧夜以继日地训练。多亏火把武僧让大家以为太阳一直不落山。

Introduction.en: Regular zombie who has pursued advanced studies in Kongfu.
Introduction.zh: 普通但已在功夫领域完成深造的僵尸。

Chat.en: Don't lump him together with that sloppy, perpetually drunk zombie.
Chat.zh: 不要将他和那个不注重打理还整天醉醺醺的家伙混为一谈。

Introduction.en: His ink painting decorated cone makes him twice tougher than normal monks.
Introduction.zh: 他的水墨画装饰路障使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: He quick-wittedly uses his cone as a speaker to call his fallows, but he hilariously holds it backwards.
Chat.zh: 他很机智地用头上的路障当扩音器招呼同伴，却又很笨地拿反了。

Introduction.en: His iron kettle headwear provides great protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他的铁壶头盔使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: He filled the iron kettle with tea and clamped it on his head so that he could sometimes experience the dizzy drunk-feelings while drinking is prohibited.
Chat.zh: 饮酒是被禁止的，因此他将这个铁壶装满茶水后扣在头上，这样第二天早上也能因彻夜难眠体验到醉酒的眩晕感。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge noisy "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波吵吵闹闹的僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: The brain on his flag proclaimed him a shrewd leader ... at least in his own estimation.
Chat.zh: 旗帜上的大脑图案代表他是一名机智的领导者……至少他自己是这么认为的。

Introduction.en: Abbot Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a large crew of skilled zombies.
Introduction.zh: 住持大动员僵尸和他的旗帜代表着超大群身怀绝技僵尸的来临。

Chat.en: The most terrible Rally Zombie you would ever witness!
Chat.zh: 这将是你遇到的最难解决的大动员僵尸！

Introduction.en: Regular futuristic jumpsuit zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普通的穿着未来连体服的僵尸。

Chat.en: Future Zombies look good in red shirts. Future fact #23: Nothing bad happens to red shirts.
Chat.zh: 未来僵尸穿着红色制服看上去不错。在未来的事实 No.23：穿着红色制服，则不会有坏事降临。

Introduction.en: His poly-polymer cone gives him twice the toughness of a regular future zombie.
Introduction.zh: 他的高聚物路障使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: He tried to calculate the volume of his mathematically perfect cone, but he always ends up dreaming about brain π.
Chat.zh: 他尝试过计算自己那几何形态十分完美的路障的体积，但一想到圆周率他就想到脑子派上去了。

Introduction.en: His techno-bucket greatly increases his protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他头上的科技铁桶使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: Other zombies call him old-fashioned for being nostalgic for the year 2008. It was a simpler time when brains were brains, zombies were zombies, and those punk plants kept to themselves.
Chat.zh: 其他僵尸因为他怀念 2008 年而说他过时。2008 年那时候什么都很简单易懂，脑子是脑子，僵尸是僵尸，植物也只是稍微叛逆一点罢了。

Introduction.en: Holo Head Zombie's head mounted force field provides hyper-protection.
Introduction.zh: 全息头僵尸的头部周围的力场提供了超强保护。

Chat.en: The force field gets a unique color from frequency harmonics and a liberal dose of purple paint.
Chat.zh: 力场的独特颜色来自谐波频率和大量的紫色颜料。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge future-proof "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波科技僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: Sometimes Future Flag Zombie regrets having to be at the bleeding edge of zombie wave advancement technology.
Chat.zh: 有时候未来旗帜僵尸后悔走在大波僵尸的前沿，不论是科技还是阵型。

Introduction.en: Robo-Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of an above-average number of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 未来大动员僵尸和他的旗帜标志着数量非常的一批僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: If you look carefully, you'll notice that Robo-Rally Zombie's flag is a sophisticated piece of hovertech combined with a stick.
Chat.zh: 如果你仔细观察，就会发现未来大动员僵尸的旗帜是一个精密的悬浮技术与一根棍子的结合体。

Introduction.en: Boosts to float over all but the tallest plant barriers.
Introduction.zh: 按下油门能飞跃植物，除非植物能高到挡住他。

DESCRIPTION.en: floats over low plants, boosts over most other plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 飞跃低矮的植物，喷气越过大部分其他植物

DESCRIPTION.en: tall blocking plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 高个子植物

Chat.en: The Jetpack Zombie was an early adopter during the brain acquisition tech explosion of 2113. Little did he know he would be stuck with version 1.0 of the simple jetpack.
Chat.zh: 喷气背包僵尸是 2113 年大脑采集技术大爆炸时期的早期使用者。那时他不知道自己将只能使用 1.0 版本的简易喷气背包。

Introduction.en: Boosts to float over all but the tallest plant barriers, in style.
Introduction.zh: 优雅地按下油门能飞跃植物，除非植物能高到挡住他。

DESCRIPTION.en: floats over low plants, boosts over most other plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 飞跃低矮的植物，喷气越过大部分其他植物

DESCRIPTION.en: tall blocking plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 高个子植物

Chat.en: A zombie who 'lives' for drama, he's an original cast member of the stage musical "Disco is BACK! For Revenge!" His signature dance move is "The Weed Whacker."
Chat.zh: 他是舞台音乐剧 “迪斯科回来了，为了复仇！”的原班人马！为了复仇！他的招牌舞步是 “锄草”。

Introduction.en: Blastronaut Zombie boosts to float over all but the tallest plant barriers.
Introduction.zh: 喷气宇航员僵尸按下油门能飞跃植物，除非植物能高到挡住他。

DESCRIPTION.en: floats over low plants, boosts over most other plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 飞跃低矮的植物，喷气越过大部分其他植物

DESCRIPTION.en: tall blocking plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 高个子植物

Chat.en: Blastronaut's rocket-pack is strictly ornamental; his hovering ability comes from a deep meditative state and from being full of helium.
Chat.zh: 喷气宇航员僵尸的火箭背包只是装饰品，他的飘浮能力来自于深度冥想和充满氦气的状态。

Introduction.en: Protect himself and nearby zombies with a force field.
Introduction.zh: 使用力场盾保护自身和周围的僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: creates a shield to protect from incoming attacks
DESCRIPTION.zh: 生成力场盾保护身边的战友免受伤害。

Chat.en: Force Shield Zombie developed his system using funds from a BiteStarter campaign. The push goal for pushing plants was not met.
Chat.zh: 力场盾僵尸利用“开啃者”活动的资金开发了自己的系统。利用力场推走植物的目标没有实现。

Introduction.en: The armor-plated cone offers phenomenal protection for its pilot.
Introduction.zh: 由铁甲加固的大型路障为驾驶员提供了巨大的保护。

Chat.en: Zombie engineers considered the orange cone the height of zombie protective technology. It wasn't until they perfected the design for the Robo-Cone that someone remembered the bucket.
Chat.zh: 僵尸工程师曾将橙色的路障视为僵尸防护技术的巅峰。直到他们完成了“机械路障”的设计后，才有人想起了铁桶的存在。

Introduction.en: Pushes plants across the lawn.
Introduction.zh: 将植物沿本行推出。

DESCRIPTION.en: pushes plants left instead of eating
DESCRIPTION.zh: 向左侧推走植物，而不是啃食

Chat.en: Now past his prime, Mecha-Football Zombie is ready to be put back into the game. Until he gets some brains, concussions aren't a concern.
Chat.zh: 即使已经过气，机甲橄榄球盔僵尸还是准备重返游戏。在他得到脑子之前，不会出现脑震荡并的问题。

Introduction.en: Drops in disco zombies when dropping the beat.
Introduction.zh: 演奏时在周围召唤迪斯科僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: summons Disco Jetpack Zombies
DESCRIPTION.zh: 召唤喷气迪斯科僵尸

Chat.en: After some initial problems with the sideburn suspension system, the Disco-tron 3000 went on to become the shufflin' dance-bot of doom it is today.
Chat.zh: 在解决了鬓角悬挂系统的一些初期问题后，迪斯科 3000 最终成为了现在的 “革新性踮脚舞蹈机”。

Introduction.en: Lands on the lawn past your defenses, then hops forward.
Introduction.zh: 通常被丢到草坪中央，越过你的防线，然后再一跳一跳往前走。

Chat.en: He always wanted to "see the world", "be his own boss", and "meet and consume interesting brains". He still doesn't understand how he got stuck in this cramped Bug Bot job 24/7.
Chat.zh: 他一直想 “看看这个世界”、“做自己的主人”、“见识和汲取有趣的大脑”。他至今仍不明白，自己怎么会被困在这份全天候幽闭的机械虫工作中。

Introduction.en: Has it all: heavy armor, laser eyes, smashing arms, and Bug Bot deployment system.
Introduction.zh: 功能齐全：沉重的铠甲、激光眼、会砸击的机械臂，以及机械虫开发系统。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with arms
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用手臂摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: randomly burns tiles with laser eyes
DESCRIPTION.zh: 时常用激光眼扫射地面

DESCRIPTION.en: launches Bug Bot when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时射出机械虫

Chat.en: The imp pilots of the Gargantuar Prime series are handpicked by Dr. Zomboss himself. They are the imp elite. The small, the mean, and the fearless! But mostly the ones who drive a stick shift.
Chat.zh: 巨尸统领者的小鬼驾驶员都是由僵尸博士亲自挑选的。他们是小鬼中的精英。渺小、卑鄙、无畏！但最主要是要会开手动挡的。

Introduction.en: The Power Tile crushing creation from the Far Future.
Introduction.zh: 来自遥远的未来，为破坏超能瓷砖而生。

DESCRIPTION.en: missile attacks can destroy Power Tiles
DESCRIPTION.zh: 导弹爆炸时可以摧毁超能瓷砖

Chat.en: When Dr. Zomboss is nestled into the comfy folds of his futuristic cerebral control pod he almost finds it hard to be evil. Of course once he sees a lawn full of happy plants that puts him right back where it needs to be, hungry and evil.
Chat.zh: 当僵尸博士赖在他舒适的未来型大脑控制舱里时，他几乎很难再邪恶下去。当然，一旦他看到草坪上长满了快乐的植物，他就又回到了饥饿和邪恶的状态。

Introduction.en: Regular lower class commoner zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普通的底层平民僵尸。

Chat.en: Someone shouted, "Bring out your undead!" And then Peasant Zombie found himself here. He simply doesn't remember anything that happened before that.
Chat.zh: 有人喊道：“把你们的亡灵交出来！”然后农民僵尸就把自己交出去了，他只是不记得在此之前发生的什么了。

Introduction.en: His stony turret makes him twice tougher than normal peasants.
Introduction.zh: 他的石质路障塔使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: Conehead Peasant is just happy to have a cone over his head. Times are tough, man. He knows a lot of zombies don't even have that.
Chat.zh: 路障农夫只是很高兴头上有一个锥子。日子真艰苦啊，他知道很多僵尸连这个都没有。

Introduction.en: His forged bucket provides great protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他经历过百般锤炼的铁桶使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: None of the other zombies seem to understand just how versatile Buckethead Peasant's choice of headwear is. Sure, his bucket makes for a great battle helmet. But just last night, he cooked a truly divine stew in it. And next time you see his band, check out what he's using for a kick drum.
Chat.zh: 其他僵尸似乎都不明白，铁桶农夫选择的头饰功能多么齐全。当然，他的铁桶是个很好的战斗头盔。但就在昨晚，他还用它炖了一锅美味的炖肉。下次你看到他的乐队时，看看他用什么当踢鼓。

Introduction.en: His king appointed helm provides amazing protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他的国王提供的头盔能提供惊人的保护，使他免受大量伤害。

Chat.en: Knight Zombie was just as surprised as anyone when Zombie King promoted him. He'd never say this out loud, but he's not sure he deserves the position. He's not sure he has what it takes to wear the armor. But like they say, "Fake it 'til you make it."
Chat.zh: 国王僵尸提拔他时，骑士僵尸和其他人一样感到惊讶。他从未大声说出来，但他不确定自己是否配得上这个职位。他不明白穿上盔甲会意味着什么。但就像人们常说的，“在遭遇到前不当回事就好了。”

Introduction.en: Turret-Head Zombie's solid headgear forms the foundation to its sturdy defense and provides it with unparalleled toughness.
Introduction.zh: 城堡头僵尸坚固的头饰为其坚固的防御奠定了基础，并为其提供了无与伦比的韧性。

Chat.en: Dr. Zomboss is well known in the global architect circles. He is the 20 time winner of the Annual Architectural Digest for most impressive medieval design. There seems to be countless variations to his free standing turrets in an open field.
Chat.zh: 僵尸博士在全球建筑界享有盛誉。他曾 20 次荣获《建筑文摘》年度最令人印象深刻的中世纪设计奖。光是空地上自由矗立的塔楼都能有无数种姿态。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge dark "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波表里黑暗的僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: They keep telling Peasant Zombie that there is no greater reward than being granted the banner to carry into battle. But when he sees other Peasant Zombies being granted cones, buckets, and even helms, he thinks maybe they're making that up so they don't hurt his feelings.
Chat.zh: 他们不停地告诉农夫僵尸，最大的奖励莫过于被授予旗帜，可以扛着旗帜上战场。但当他看到其他农民僵尸被授予路障、铁桶甚至头盔时，他觉得这也许是他们为了不伤害他的感情而编造的。

Introduction.en: Peasant Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a large wave of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 农夫大动员僵尸和他的旗帜代表着超大群僵尸的来临。

Chat.en: Keep a mind on what you're talkin' about. King Zombie will be unhappy to hear zombies wondering whether Peasant Rally Zombie with a helm is stronger than the King.
Chat.zh: 千万别多嘴。国王僵尸很不乐意听到大家讨论戴上头盔的农夫大动员僵尸是否比国王还要强大。

Introduction.en: Returns projectiles that are shot at him.
Introduction.zh: 将砸向他的弹射物丢回。

DESCRIPTION.en: speeds up while spinning
DESCRIPTION.zh: 旋转时会加速行进

DESCRIPTION.en: attacks from bubbles or flame
DESCRIPTION.zh: 来自火焰或者泡泡的攻击

Chat.en: Oh sure, everyone loves to laugh at Jester Zombie's clownish routines. But what no one knows is that he has a Master of Fine Arts from the Chewliard Performing Arts School. Heck, he's been on stage with some of the finest classical theatre companies this side of the lawn. But sometimes you just gotta go where the paycheck is.
Chat.zh: 当然，每个人都喜欢嘲笑小丑僵尸的小丑表演。但没有人知道的是，他曾在“咀嚼者”表演艺术学校获得艺术硕士学位。见鬼，他曾与最优秀的古典剧团同台演出。但有时候，去薪水高的地方才是最佳选择。

Introduction.en: Transforms plants into passive sheep.
Introduction.zh: 将植物变为毫无攻击力的绵羊。

DESCRIPTION.en: plants in Floawerpots cannot be transformed
DESCRIPTION.zh: 飞天花盆里的植物无法被变为绵羊

Chat.en: All the zombies agree, Wizard Zombie's powers of transmutation are impressive. But what they don't get is ... why sheep? Everyone knows it would be more helpful if the Wizard used his powers to turn plants into, say, more zombies. But yeah, no one is going to say that to his face.
Chat.zh: 所有僵尸都认为，巫师僵尸的变身能力令人印象深刻。但他们不明白的是……为什么是羊？大家都知道，如果魔法师用他的能力把植物变成，比如说，更多的僵尸，那会更有帮助。不过是的，没人会当着他的面这么说。

Introduction.en: Transforms plants into passive sheep at a higher frequency.
Introduction.zh: 以更高的频率将植物变为毫无攻击力的绵羊。

DESCRIPTION.en: plants in Floawerpots cannot be transformed
DESCRIPTION.zh: 飞天花盆里的植物无法被变为绵羊

Chat.en: As the saying goes, "similarity completes compatibility", and in order to increase his magical power, the Archmage Zombie changed his clothes to white.
Chat.zh: 俗话说“相似相容”，为了提高自己的法力，大法师僵尸把衣服换成了白色。

Introduction.en: Grants knight helms to nearby peasant zombies.
Introduction.zh: 为附近的农夫僵尸授予骑士头盔。

Chat.en: As Shakespeare once wrote, "Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown." And Zombie King couldn't agree more. It is incredibly difficult to get a good night's sleep with a crown on your head. That thing is all kinds of uncomfortable.
Chat.zh: 莎士比亚曾写道：“头戴王冠的人不安宁。”国王僵尸对此深表赞同。头戴王冠是很难睡个好觉的。那东西在各方面让人不舒服。

Introduction.en: Grants knight helms to nearby zombies, any kind but himself!
Introduction.zh: 为附近的僵尸授予骑士头盔，除了自己的所有僵尸！

Chat.en: It must be easier to grant someone else with our spare helmet instead of battling on our own, right?
Chat.zh: 比起自己去战斗，把自己多余的盔甲授予他人肯定更轻松吧。

Introduction.en: Spit past most your defenses, then claws forward.
Introduction.zh: 从火焰中钻出，穿过你的大部分防线，然后伸出利爪向前抓去。

DESCRIPTION.en: immune to fire damage
DESCRIPTION.zh: 无法受到火焰伤害

Chat.en: Imp Zombie knows he's too old to wear a dragon costume like a kid on Halloween. But he doesn't care. Let the others judge. His spirit animal is a dragon, and he feels closer to his true self when he's dressed like this.
Chat.zh: 小鬼僵尸知道自己长大了，不能像小屁孩一样在万圣节穿上龙的服装。但他不在乎。让别人去评判吧。他的精神动物是龙，穿成这样，他感觉更接近真实的自己。

Introduction.en: Summoned past most of your defenses, then shambles forward.
Introduction.zh: 登场时通常越过你的大部分防御，然后摇摇晃晃地向前走。

Chat.en: Frankly, Imp Monk Zombie decided to don the robes because of the sweet haircut that went with them.
Chat.zh: 老实说，僧侣小鬼决定穿上长袍，是因为它的发型很可爱。

Introduction.en: Immense zombie who brings the hammer down.
Introduction.zh: 巨尸总能一锤定音。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with hammer
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用石锤摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: launches Imp Monk when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时丢出僧侣小鬼

Chat.en: When Dark Ages Gargantuar wants to find pantaloons that fit him, he has to shop at the "Enormous & Towering" store. He hates it though. It's embarrassing. He just wants to shop for clothes where all the other zombies shop.
Chat.zh: 当黑暗巨尸想找一条合身的裤子时，肯定会去 “巨大与高耸 ”商店购物。但他讨厌这样，太尴尬了。他只想在其他僵尸购物的地方买衣服。

Introduction.en: The desolator of all, from dark times.
Introduction.zh: 黑暗时代毁灭一切的暴君。

DESCRIPTION.en: lobbed fireballs can hatch Imp Dragon Zombies
DESCRIPTION.zh: 发射的火球可以孵出火龙小鬼

Chat.en: With a rumble of destruction, Dr. Zomboss forged his Dark Dragon in the heart of a volcano. Then he tempered the beast in the chilled waters of Doom Lake. Finally he fed its furnace with coal from the Mines of Morbidity. And the paint job - that was done by Carl.
Chat.zh: 伴随着毁灭的轰鸣声，僵尸博士在火山中心铸造了他的黑暗巨龙。然后，他在末日湖冰冷的湖水中锤炼这头巨兽。最后，他用“疾病矿井”里的煤炭喂饱了它的熔炉。而喷漆工作则是由卡尔完成的。

Introduction.en: Regular beach bum zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普通的在海滩游荡的僵尸

Chat.en: Pompadour Zombie recently noticed that he was wearing only one flip-flop. He THINKS he lost the other one while doing the limbo at a bonfire party the other night. But to be honest, that entire night is a little hazy ... and that flip-flop could be anywhere.
Chat.zh: 飞机头僵尸最近发现自己只穿了一只人字拖。他以为是前几天晚上在篝火晚会上跳 “凌波舞 ”时弄丢了另一只。但说实话，整个晚上他都有点不明所以……那只人字拖可能在任何地方。

Introduction.en: His starfish cone gives him twice the toughness of a normal pompadour zombie.
Introduction.zh: 他黏上海星的路障使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: Go to the beach, they said. Put a cone on your head, they said. So, yeah, that's what Pompadour Conehead did. He's at his best when following simple instructions.
Chat.zh: 他们说，去海滩。他们说，把路障戴在头上。没错，路障飞机头就是这么做的，他最擅长的就是听从简单的指示。

Introduction.en: His scallop shelled bucket gives him great resistance to damage.
Introduction.zh: 他挂上扇贝的铁桶使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: Pompadour Buckethead tried to learn to play the ukelele. He figured it would be easier to learn than the guitar on account of how small it is. But his stiff fingers ... they just weren't made for it. Now he just bangs on his bucket. And he's not half-bad either.
Chat.zh: 铁桶飞机头曾试图学习弹奏尤克里里。他认为这比吉他容易学，因为它很小。但他那僵硬的手指……根本不适合。现在他只能敲敲他的水桶，但弹得也不错。

Introduction.en: Crab-head Pompadour's crab exoskeleton provides tremendous protection.
Introduction.zh: 螃蟹飞机头的螃蟹外骨骼提供了巨大的保护。

Chat.en: Another proof that Deep Sea Gargantuar is not a sea creature.
Chat.zh: 深海巨尸不是海洋生物的另一大证据。

Introduction.en: Regular beach blanket zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普通的在海滩边晒太阳的僵尸

Chat.en: Is it weird that we haven't seen any female zombies before? Some say yes. Some say no. Either way, Bikini Zombie is used to breaking new ground. She's not afraid to go where no woman zombie has gone before. You could call her a pioneer. You could call her a hero.
Chat.zh: 我们以前没见过女僵尸，这奇怪吗？有人说是，也有人说不奇怪。无论如何，比基尼僵尸习惯于开辟新天地。她不怕去没有女僵尸去过的地方。你可以称她为先驱，也可以称她为英雄。

Introduction.en: Her starfish cone gives her twice the toughness of a normal bikini zombie.
Introduction.zh: 她黏上海星的路障使她变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: See that starfish on Bikini Conehead's cone? She put it there herself. She gets a lot of compliments on it too. And sure enough, now it seems like everyone is accessorizing with starfish. She's a trendsetter, that one.
Chat.zh: 看到路障比基尼的海星了吗？是她自己放上去的，也因此得到了很多赞美。果然，现在好像每个人都在用海星做装饰，她真是能引领潮流啊。

Introduction.en: Her scallop shelled bucket gives her great resistance to damage.
Introduction.zh: 她挂上扇贝的铁桶使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: Bikini Buckethead had big ambitions. She wanted to do more than lurch around on a beach all day. Her life's dream: to perform internationally with a synchronized swimming team. Sadly, the nose plug was her undoing. If she only had a nose ...
Chat.zh: 铁桶比基尼的野心很大，她想做的不仅仅是整天在沙滩上晃来晃去。她一生的梦想是：在国际花样游泳队中表演。不幸的是，鼻塞成了她的致命伤。如果她只有一个鼻子没有塞……

Introduction.en: Crab-head Bikini's crab exoskeleton provides tremendous protection.
Introduction.zh: 螃蟹比基尼的螃蟹外骨骼提供了巨大的保护。

Chat.en: Sometimes it's comfortable to feel the sense of security in others' safety-room like hermit crabs. In a word, long live bionics!
Chat.zh: 有时候体会寄居蟹那种寄人篱下的安全感也是很舒适的。总之，仿生学万岁！

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge wet "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大“浪”僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: Talk about a disgruntled zombie. Beach Flag Zombie is fed up. None of the other zombies seem to appreciate just how difficult it is for him to swim while holding a flag. Not once have they thanked him for doing the hard work that needs to be done. So it shouldn't come as a surprise: He's been interviewing for jobs somewhere else.
Chat.zh: 说到令他不满的僵尸，沙滩旗帜僵尸受够了。其他僵尸似乎都不理解他举着旗子游泳有多么困难，他们没有一次感谢他做了需要做的艰苦工作。因此，他去别的地方面试工作也就不足为奇了。

Introduction.en: Beach Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a floody "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 沙滩大动员僵尸和他的旗帜代表着一大群僵尸如潮涌般袭来。

Chat.en: He could have accelerated if he used his flag as a paddle.
Chat.zh: 要是他把他的旗帜当作桨来用的话还能走得更快。

Introduction.en: Snorkel zombies can swim underwater.
Introduction.zh: 浮潜僵尸可以在水底游动前进。

DESCRIPTION.en: submerges to avoid attacks
DESCRIPTION.zh: 潜入水中躲避攻击

Chat.en: Snorkel Zombie has a hard time getting the Bikini Zombies. He's tried offering them flowers, jewelry, and even chocolate-covered brains. But nothing seems to work. They just can't seem to see past the snorkel on his face.
Chat.zh: 浮潜僵尸饱受感情之苦，为了得到比基尼僵尸的芳心，他试过给他们鲜花、珠宝，甚至是裹着巧克力的大脑，但似乎都不奏效，她们似乎就是看不透他脸上的潜水镜。

Introduction.en: Surfs past plants on the water, then carries board on land.
Introduction.zh: 冲浪越过水上的植物，再举着冲浪板上岸。

DESCRIPTION.en: can crush a plant with his board
DESCRIPTION.zh: 可以用冲浪板摧毁一株植物

Chat.en: Surfer Zombie took up surfing just last year. At first, he only did it because he thought it would make him look cool. But he was a natural. Now he can hang 10 with the best of them. Now he's headed to the pro circuit. Now he IS cool.
Chat.zh: 冲浪僵尸去年才开始学习冲浪。起初，他只是觉得冲浪会让他看起来很酷，但他很有天赋。现在，他可以和最好的冲浪手一起冲浪。好了不说了，他要参加职业巡回赛了，可酷了。

Introduction.en: Surfs past plants on the water at a higher speed, then carries board on land.
Introduction.zh: 以更快的速度冲浪越过水上的植物，再举着冲浪板上岸。

DESCRIPTION.en: can crush a plant with his board
DESCRIPTION.zh: 可以用冲浪板摧毁一株植物

DESCRIPTION.en: engines on his surfboard can be burnt by E.M. Peach
DESCRIPTION.zh: 滑板引擎可以被脉冲黄桃烧毁

Chat.en: During that serious battle, most of the Surfer Zombies headed towards the plants without hesitation, while the rest hiding behind the shark-shaped machine doing researches about how it worked. Definitely NOT because of fear!
Chat.zh: 在那场大战中，大部分的冲浪僵尸冲锋陷阵，而还有一小部分躲在那只机械鲨鱼身后对它做着研究，但绝对不是因为怕死！

Introduction.en: Throws octopi at your plants to bind them up.
Introduction.zh: 向你的植物投掷章鱼，使植物无法行动。

DESCRIPTION.en: bound plants are passive until their octopus is destroyed
DESCRIPTION.zh: 在章鱼被摧毁之前，被缠住的植物没有行动力

Chat.en: It started innocently enough. One day, Octo Zombie decided to get a pet octopus. But he loved that octopus so much, he got another and another... and another. Next thing you know, he was volunteering at an octopus rescue shelter. And now, well, no one wants to tell him, but he's pretty much the undersea equivalent of a cat lady. You should see how many are living at his house. It's quite startling.
Chat.zh: 事情的起因很简单。有一天，章鱼僵尸决定养一只宠物章鱼。但他太喜欢那只章鱼了，于是又买了一只，一只，又一只。接下来，他就在章鱼救助站当起了志愿者。现在，虽然没人愿意告诉他，但他已经成了海底的猫夫人，你应该看看他家里住了多少只猫，太惊人了！

Introduction.en: Casts line to pull far plants to him.
Introduction.zh: 甩出鱼钩，把远处的植物拉到他身边。

DESCRIPTION.en: pulls plants to the right
DESCRIPTION.zh: 把植物向右拉走

DESCRIPTION.en: plants next to him are tossed off the lawn
DESCRIPTION.zh: 相邻的植物直接被甩出草坪

Chat.en: Everyone is tired of Fisherman Zombie's fishing stories. He's always bragging about the size of his catch. Time and time again, he claims to have caught "the big one". But the fact of the matter is, no one has seen him actually catch a fish. Not once. It's more than a little suspicious.
Chat.zh: 每个人都听腻了渔夫僵尸的钓鱼故事。他总是吹嘘自己钓到的鱼有多大，一次又一次地声称自己钓到了“大鱼”，但事实上，没人见过他真正钓到鱼。一次也没有，这就有点可疑了。

Introduction.en: Washes in past your defenses, then flounders forward.
Introduction.zh: 冲过你的防线，然后蹒跚前行。

Chat.en: Imp Mermaid Zombie couldn't decide whether to wear the top made out of coconut shells or the top made out of seashells. She went with the slinky coconut-shell number because, really, the seashells are soooo last wave.
Chat.zh: 美人鱼小鬼无法决定是穿椰子壳做的上衣还是贝壳做的上衣。她选择了那件纤细的椰壳上衣，因为，贝壳真的太常见了。

Introduction.en: Titanic zombie who isn't shellfish with his might.
Introduction.zh: 这个巨尸并不是贝类动物，但威力依然很强大。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with driftwood
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用浮木摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: launches Imp Mermaid when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时丢出美人鱼小鬼

Chat.en: This big guy loves the water. When he's deep down in it, he feels light as a feather. He feels like he's flying. Most importantly, during those precious moments, he feels as if the weight of Imp Mermaid Zombie has been lifted from his shoulders.
Chat.zh: 这个大家伙喜欢水，当他深入水中时，感觉轻如鸿毛。他感觉自己在飞翔。最重要的是，在那段美好时光中，他感觉自己肩上美人鱼小鬼带来的重担被卸下了。

Introduction.en: The ravenous engine of carnage from the murky depths.
Introduction.zh: 来自高压深处的绞肉机。

DESCRIPTION.en: mouth turbine can pull plants to it
DESCRIPTION.zh: 嘴里的涡轮机将植物吸走

DESCRIPTION.en: summoned zombie sharks can consume plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 召唤来的僵尸鲨鱼能把植物吞下

Chat.en: The Zombot Sharktronic Sub is a true labor of love. Dr. Zomboss obsessed over every detail of the aquatic mechanism of doom as he worked on it day in and day out from the wee hours of the morning until well after dark. He carefully handcrafted the shark's nearly impenetrable skin. He shaved each razor-sharp tooth to a point by hand. And he painstakingly installed the lethal plant-consuming fan inside the machines' horrific maw all by himself. Zomboss shed more than one tear of joy when his masterpiece was complete. Say what you will about the evil genius, but he is quite passionate about his projects.
Chat.zh: 巨鲨号深潜艇是充满爱的劳动成果。僵尸博士日复一日地工作，从凌晨一直工作到天黑，痴迷于这个水下杀手的每一个细节。他小心翼翼地手工制作鲨鱼几乎坚不可摧的皮肤，亲手将每一颗锋利的牙齿剃成尖角，还独自一人费尽心机地在机器可怕的大嘴里安装了致命的涡轮发动机。当他的杰作完成时，僵尸博士流下了禁不住潸然泪下。不得不承认这是一位邪恶的天才，但他对自己的作品充满热情。

Introduction.en: Regular cave-dwelling zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普通穴居僵尸。

Chat.en: Cave Zombie was busy painting handprints on cave walls when he was told to start fighting plants. He's not sure why he's fighting plants, but he hopes he can get back to painting soon. He was feeling inspired. He had plans for some big pieces. Art school was finally paying off.
Chat.zh: 洞窟僵尸正忙着在洞壁上画手印，却突然被告知要开始与植物战斗。他不知道自己为什么要和植物战斗，但他希望自己能尽快回来绘画。他刚好觉得灵感来了，计划画几幅大作品。在艺术学校的付出也将终于要有回报了。

Introduction.en: His mammoth horn cone makes him twice as tough as normal cave-dwellers.
Introduction.zh: 他的猛犸象牙路障使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: Cave Conehead Zombie was the first zombie to invent the cone. He lashed the horn of a mammoth to a slab of petrified wood ... and boom! A cone! The invention of the cone changed everything for the zombies. EVERYTHING.
Chat.zh: 洞窟路障僵尸是第一个发明锥体的僵尸。他把猛犸象的角绑在一块石化木板上……啪！一个圆锥出现了！圆锥的发明改变了僵尸的一切。一切啊！

Introduction.en: His stone "bucket" hat provides great protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他头上的夹杂着铁块的石头“铁桶”使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: Cave Buckethead Zombie likes rocks. He likes rocks A LOT. He strapped a rock to his head and called it a bucket. None of the other Cave Zombies know a "bucket" is, but they like his style.
Chat.zh: 洞窟铁桶僵尸喜欢石头，非常喜欢。他把石头绑在头上，称之为“铁桶”。其他洞窟僵尸都不知道“铁桶”是什么，但他们喜欢他的作风。

Introduction.en: The ice block on his head provides amazing protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他头上的冰块能提供惊人的保护，使他免受伤害。

Chat.en: One day, a Cave Zombie fell head-first into a glacial stream. It had been a bad day already, so he lay there in the frigid water for a long time contemplating the insignificance of his life. When he finally stood up, he discovered that his head was encased in ice. At last, his life had meaning! He was unique! He was Blockhead Zombie! At least, that's his story and he's sticking to it.
Chat.zh: 一天，洞窟僵尸一头栽进了冰川的溪流中。这一天已经够倒霉的了，所以他躺在冰冷的河水里沉思了很久，思考着自己生命是否毫无意义。当他终于站起来时，他发现自己的头被冰包裹着。他的生命终于有了意义！他是独一无二的！他是冰砖头僵尸！至少，这是独一无二故事，他一辈子不会忘的。

Introduction.en: Mammoth-headed Zombie's mammoth skull provides tremendous protection.
Introduction.zh: 猛犸头僵尸的猛犸头骨提供了巨大的保护。

Chat.en: It wasn't a real mammoth skull. Having seen the technology from Dr. Zomboss, it'd be known that it is the result of long-time work.
Chat.zh: 那不是真正的猛犸头骨，既然见识过僵尸博士的科技肯定能知道那是努力的结晶。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge frosty "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波乘着冰风僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: Cave Flag Zombie has been in the flag-carrying business for a long time. It's been his life's work. He's good at it. But sometimes, just sometimes, he longs for a change. He wonders if he could be good at something else. He wonders if he could leave it all behind and start fresh. He's pretty sure he's having a mid-life crisis.
Chat.zh: 洞窟旗帜僵尸从事摇旗工作已经有很长一段时间了，已经成为他的一番事业了，并且无比擅长这一行业。 但有时，只是有时，他渴望改变。他想知道自己是否能胜任其他工作，是否能抛开一切、重新开始，他很确定自己遇到了中年危机。

Introduction.en: Cave Rally Zombie and his flag marks the arrival of a large icy storm of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 洞窟大动员僵尸和他的旗帜代表着超大群僵尸乘着冰风雪暴而来。

Chat.en: If Cave Rally Zombie hadn't been fast enough, his flag would have been taken away by Tomb Raiser Zombie.
Chat.zh: 要不是洞窟大动员僵尸的速度够快，不然旗子早就被死神僵尸叼走了。

Introduction.en: Zombie that can throw snow balls at range.
Introduction.zh: 可以在一定范围内投掷雪球。

DESCRIPTION.en: snow balls cool down plants until they freeze into blocks
DESCRIPTION.zh: 雪球能冷冻植物，直到植物被冻成冰块

Chat.en: Shhhhh ... Hunter Zombie didn't actually kill that sabertooth tiger. He found the skin at a thrift store. Also, he's a vegetarian. Tell no one.
Chat.zh: 嘘……猎人僵尸其实并没有杀死头上顶着的那只剑齿虎，这是在旧货店找到的虎皮。另外，他是个素食主义者，别告诉别人。

Introduction.en: Zombie that can throw snow balls towards his farthest target.
Introduction.zh: 可以朝本行最远的目标投掷雪球。

DESCRIPTION.en: snow balls cool down plants until they freeze into blocks
DESCRIPTION.zh: 雪球能冷冻植物，直到植物被冻成冰块

Chat.en: He won everyone else cuz no one is willing to be touched by his sparky helmet.
Chat.zh: 他能称霸是因为没人想碰到他那满是刺的头盔。

Introduction.en: Dodo bird with an imp rider.
Introduction.zh: 载着小鬼的渡渡鸟。

DESCRIPTION.en: dodo can flap and jump over barricades as well as troublesome plants
DESCRIPTION.zh: 渡渡鸟可以扑腾飞起，越过障碍和麻烦的植物

Chat.en: Dodo Rider believes dodos are the future of transportation. He believes a public dodo-riding system is not only a wise expenditure of tax dollars but would help the vast majority of zombies get where they need to go more efficiently. Everyone keeps telling him there's no future in dodos, but he refuses to listen.
Chat.zh: 渡渡鸟骑手认为渡渡鸟是交通工具的进化方向。他认为，公共渡渡鸟骑行系统不仅是明智的节省税款手段，还能帮助绝大多数僵尸更高效地到达目的地。然而每个人都告诉他渡渡鸟没有未来，但他不信。

Introduction.en: Strong zombie that can push blocks of ice across the lawn.
Introduction.zh: 健壮到能推动冰块的僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with frozen blocks
DESCRIPTION.zh: 推动的冰块能碾压植物

Chat.en: Troglobite has been pushing ice blocks across the tundra day in and day out for as long as he can remember. It's cold and exhausting work, and frankly, he's ready for a vacation. He'd like to go somewhere sunny and warm for a change. He'd like to relax in the sand. He hears Big Wave Beach is nice this time of year.
Chat.zh: 从穴居僵尸记事起，他就日复一日地在冻原上推冰块。这项工作又冷又累，老实说，他已经准备好去度假了。他想去一个阳光明媚、温暖的地方，换换心情。他想在沙滩上放松一下，正好听说这个季节的巨浪沙滩很不错。

Introduction.en: Zombie that is strong enough to push blocks of ice that are more dangerous onto the lawn.
Introduction.zh: 健壮到能推入更危险的冰块的僵尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with frozen blocks
DESCRIPTION.zh: 推动的冰块能碾压植物

Chat.en: The reason why Hunter Leader Zombie was caught up with by Troglobite Warchief is that he proposed a challenge about who holds longer in the icy water.
Chat.zh: 猎人领袖僵尸之所以会被穴居首领僵尸超越，犯下的最大的错误就是跟他比谁更受得了冻。

Introduction.en: Zombie hiding in a log with a pack of snow weasels. Weasels are released when her log is shattered.
Introduction.zh: 和一群雪鼬鼠躲在一根木头里的僵尸。当她的木头被击碎时，黄鼠狼就会被释放出来。

DESCRIPTION.en: releases zombie ice weasels when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受伤一定程度会释放一群冰鼬

Chat.en: Weasel Hoarder claims she's the one who wrote the song "Pop! Goes the Weasel." And for eons now, she's been demanding royalties for it. But everyone just ignores her. They know what Weasel Hoarder can't even carry a tune, much less write a catchy ditty about the sound of vermin make when hugged a bit too tightly.
Chat.zh: 囤鼬僵尸声称“黄鼠狼快跑”这首歌是她写的。一直以来，她都在索要版税，但大家都不理她，他们知道 囤鼬僵尸连调都搭不上，更不用说写一首朗朗上口的小曲来描述害虫被抱得太紧时发出的声音了。

Introduction.en: Once released, weasels run full speed even over ice floes to nibble your brains.
Introduction.zh: 一旦挣脱束缚，冰鼬将会跳过所有浮冰全力冲向你的大脑。

Chat.en: Skweek-ka-REE!
Chat.zh: 吱——嘎——呼呼呼！

Introduction.en: Thrown over most of your defenses, then ambles onward.
Introduction.zh: 被丢出越过你的防线，然后再往前或往后走。

Chat.en: Yeti Imp recently took up knitting. He started with a scarf, moved to mittens and eventually knitted an entire bodysuit out of hair he shaved off of Yeti Zombie. He just loves knitting. When those needles are in his hands, he feels a sense of calm he's never felt before.
Chat.zh: 雪人小鬼最近开始编织了。他从围巾开始，到手套，最后用从雪人僵尸身上剃下来的头发编织了一整套连体服。他就是喜欢编织。当针在他手中时，他感到一种前所未有的平静。

Introduction.en: Massive sloth skinned zombie with a case of the imps. Carries and throws three imps instead of just one.
Introduction.zh: 披着树懒皮的巨尸。可携带和投掷三个小鬼，而不是一个。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with icicle
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用冰棍摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: fire off Yeti Imps when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时丢出雪人小鬼

Chat.en: Somewhere along the line, Sloth Gargantuar contracted a bad case of Yeti Imps. He used soap, medicinal powders, and a salve made from sloth slobber in an attempt to get rid of them ... to no avail. But the truth is, he's grown used to their presence. The darn things are itchy. They're always squabbling. They nag him endlessly. But at this point, he'd probably miss them if they ever cleared up.
Chat.zh: 不知从什么时候起，树懒皮巨尸被烦人的雪人小鬼缠上了。他用肥皂、药粉和树懒口水制成的药膏试图赶走它们......却无济于事。但事实上，他已经习惯了它们的存在。这些该死的东西让他很痒。他们总是争吵不休，没完没了地唠叨。但在这一点上，如果他们消失了，他可能会想念他们。

Introduction.en: The mammoth mech with an ice blast from the past.
Introduction.zh: 来自冰河世纪的机械猛犸。

Chat.en: Dr. Zomboss was real impressed with himself when he came up with the idea to build a weaponized woolly mammoth with the power to blast snow and ice out of its mechanical trunk. But what Dr. Zomboss didn't realize until it was too late: He's allergic to mammoth fur, even to those bionically made. Now he has to load up on allergy medication every time he wants to take the darn thing out for a spin.
Chat.zh: 当僵尸博士想出制造一座武装的长毛猛犸象，并能从机械躯干中喷射出冰雪的时候，他几乎要对自己刮目相看。但是，僵尸博士直到坐进这个机器意识到：他对猛犸象的皮毛过敏，即使是仿生制造。现在，每次他想带着这该死的东西出去兜风时，都得大把大把地吃抗过敏药。

Introduction.en: Regular expertly-coiffed moustache zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普普通通但是会定期修理胡须的僵尸。

Chat.en: Adventurer Zombie just went looking for jolly good show and somehow ended up in the Lost City. "Hmm. Yes. Quite." is all that he would say on the matter.
Chat.zh: 冒险家僵尸只是去寻找欢乐的好戏，结果却莫名其妙地来到了失落之城。“嗯，没错。”他对这件事只想这么评价。

Introduction.en: His expedition cone makes him twice tougher than normal adventurers.
Introduction.zh: 他的远征型路障使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: No one ever presumes that he's Dr. Unlivingstone. Just once, though he wish that someone would.
Chat.zh: 从来没有人看出他就是活死石博士。哪怕一次，他都希望有人能看出来。

Introduction.en: His rugged bucket provides considerable protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他坚固的铁桶使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: Buckethead Adventurer's greatest discovery was that one morning, without warning or reason, there was a bucket on his head.
Chat.zh: 铁桶探宝僵尸最大的发现是，有一天早上，在毫无征兆或原因的情况下，他的头上多了一个铁桶。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of an intrepid "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波敢死的僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: Flag Adventurer Zombie is always shouting "Tally ho!" as he leads the charge. At least, he's shouting it in his head.
Chat.zh: 旗帜探宝僵尸在带头冲锋时总是大喊 “塔里吼！”。至少，他是在心里喊的。

Introduction.en: Drops in past defenses.
Introduction.zh: 掉入你的防御中心。

DESCRIPTION.en: drops in and hangs for a moment between your lawn
DESCRIPTION.zh: 坠入并在草坪中央悬挂一段时间

Chat.en: He faked his pilot's license and figured nobody would notice. But they did.
Chat.zh: 他伪造了自己的飞行证，还以为大家没注意到，实际上所有人都很清楚。

Introduction.en: Digs up plants and throws them behind him.
Introduction.zh: 将植物铲起并丢到身后。

DESCRIPTION.en: blocks incoming projectiles, but is vulnerable to lobbed shots
DESCRIPTION.zh: 抵挡直射来的子弹，但是在投掷子弹面前很脆弱

Chat.en: Excavator Zombie once heard a song about having a hammer. He liked the idea, but decided it was too mainstream for him - so he got a shovel. Now he's confident that he's clearly the coolest zombie, the others are just too jealous to admit it.
Chat.zh: 发掘者僵尸曾听过一首关于拥有了锤子的歌。他很喜欢这个想法，但觉得这对他来说太主流了——于是他就有了一把铲子。现在他自信满满，认为自己显然是最酷的僵尸，只是其他僵尸嫉妒得不敢承认罢了。

Introduction.en: Her parasol provides protection from lobbed projectiles.
Introduction.zh: 她的洋伞使她免受投掷子弹的伤害。

Chat.en: Wealthy beyond reason, the Parasol Zombie lived a life of luxury - when what she craved was a life of adventure. She funded the expedition to the Lost City and set out to see its wonders for herself, never forgetting to bring her trusty parasol. "In case it rains," she explained - but it only came out sounding like "Brains".
Chat.zh: 阳伞僵尸富可敌国，过着奢华的生活，而她渴望的是冒险生活。她资助了前往失落之城的探险队，并亲自踏上了一览奇观的旅程，还不忘带上她那把值得信赖的阳伞。她解释说，“以防落水”，但听起来却像“以防落脑”。

Introduction.en: Bug carries zombie in over ground defenses and lifts him over barriers.
Introduction.zh: 蜻蜓使僵尸越过低矮植物，并把他举过其他障碍物。

Chat.en: Bug Zombie and Bug make a great team. Partly because Bug gives Bug Zombie great mobility, but mostly because they share an intense disinterest in horses.
Chat.zh: 僵尸和蜻蜓是绝佳的搭档。部分原因是蜻蜓给了僵尸强大的机动性，但主要原因是他们都对马不感兴趣。

Introduction.en: Swings in on a vine to lane midway onto your lawn.
Introduction.zh: 抓着藤蔓进入草坪的中央。

DESCRIPTION.en: lands four to six tiles into your lawn
DESCRIPTION.zh: 直接越过四到六格进入你的草坪

Chat.en: Relic Hunter has hunted some pretty impressive relic in his days. Idols, antiques, curios... he's hunted 'em all.
Chat.zh: 遗迹猎宝僵尸曾猎取过一些令人印象深刻的文物。偶像、古董、古玩……他都猎过。

Introduction.en: Drops pack on Gold Tile.
Introduction.zh: 将背包丢在黄金地砖上

DESCRIPTION.en: pack becomes tent from which zombies emerge
DESCRIPTION.zh: 背包会在原地搭起帐篷，源源不断地钻出僵尸

Chat.en: Imp Porter is stronger than he looks. He's also more charming, smarter and has a better education.
Chat.zh: 搬运工小鬼不仅比看上去更强壮，还更有魅力、更聪明、受过更好的教育。

Introduction.en: Uses skull to steal sun, then unleashes energy in a destructive beam.
Introduction.zh: 用骷髅头偷走阳光蓄能，再发射一道致命的激光。

DESCRIPTION.en: tries to steal sun
DESCRIPTION.zh: 会尝试偷走阳光

DESCRIPTION.en: stolen sun cannot be retrieved
DESCRIPTION.zh: 偷走的阳光不会再返还

Chat.en: Unlike the more famous crystal skulls, turquoise skulls are totally non-mysterious and common as dirt.
Chat.zh: 与更有名的水晶头骨不同，青骷髅头完全不神秘，而且像泥土一样常见。

Introduction.en: Gets tossed past most defenses, then explores on foot.
Introduction.zh: 被丢过你的大部分防线，再向前探索。

Chat.en: Nepotism got Lost City Imp where he is. He's Bug Zombie's second cousin thrice removed, but he parlayed that connection into a sweet gig getting carried around in a little box.
Chat.zh: 靠裙带关系，失落之城小鬼才有今天的地位。他是蜻蜓僵尸三代单传的二表哥，但他却靠着这层关系获得了一份好工作，被装在一个小轿子里到处跑。

Introduction.en: Terrifying behemoth of exploratory fury.
Introduction.zh: 可怕但乐忠探索的巨尸。

DESCRIPTION.en: crushes plants with torch
DESCRIPTION.zh: 用火把摧毁植物

DESCRIPTION.en: throws Lost City Imp when damaged
DESCRIPTION.zh: 受重伤时丢出失落之城小鬼

Chat.en: Porter Gargantuar dreams of the discovery that will make him powerful and influential. Maybe then the Imps will be the one carrying him around. It's always nice to have dreams.
Chat.zh: 搬运工巨尸梦想着能发现使他变得强大和有影响力的东西，也许到那时，小鬼们就会带着他到处跑了。有梦想总是好的。

Introduction.en: The floating fortress from the skies above.
Introduction.zh: 漂浮在空中的战斗堡垒。

DESCRIPTION.en: drops zombies and bags o' sand
DESCRIPTION.zh: 向地上丢僵尸和沙袋

Chat.en: After repeated failures with variously robotic engines of destruction, Dr. Zomboss decided to go with a kinder, more eco-friendly lighter-than-air-option to sow disaster and discord.
Chat.zh: 在使用各种毁灭型仿生机器屡屡失败后，僵尸博士决定使用一种更友好、更环保的、比空气更轻的选择，用来传播灾难和不和谐。

Introduction.en: Regular jetpacked zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普普通通背着喷射器的僵尸。

Chat.en: Don’t underestimate the Pilot Zombies. Keeping the balance in the air instead of being upside down isn’t that easy. Flying gives them a feeling of freedom - but that's true only when he still had a brain.
Chat.zh: 千万不要小看普通飞行员僵尸，在空中保持平衡而不是四脚朝天并不是一件容易的事情。飞翔带给他们自由的感觉，当然，那是在他们还有脑子的时候。

Introduction.en: His cone glued to his head makes him twice tougher than normal pilot.
Introduction.zh: 他那胶粘在头上的路障使他变得比原先抗打两倍。

Chat.en: In order to adapt to the strong wind in air, Conehead Pilot purchased a new strong adhesive. Although others advised him not to take the cone high in the air, he considers himself a symbol of his stylish image.
Chat.zh: 为了适应空中强劲的风速，路障飞行员购买了一款新型强效粘合剂。尽管僵尸们都建议他不要将路障带到高空中，但是他自认为那是他时尚形象的象征。

Introduction.en: His fan-decorated bucket provides great protection from damage.
Introduction.zh: 他那安装了风扇的铁桶使他极其抗揍。

Chat.en: You hear that? The clunking sound of the updraft hitting the buckets. Yep, that's the zombies' favorite music, which always brings fun to their boring lives. That's why Buckethead Pilot is the most famous in zombies.
Chat.zh: 听见了吗？上升气流撞击铁桶所发出的哐当声，对，那就是僵尸们最喜爱的音乐，它总是可以给僵尸们枯燥无味的生活带来乐趣。这也是铁桶飞行员最受僵尸们追捧的原因。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of an aeronautical "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波飞行的僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: In Flag Pilot's view, an outstanding flag is very important if they want to keep up with the latest trend. However, the zombies are only concerned about whether he can lead them to fresh brains... Neither do trends nor anything but brains could fulfill their appetites.
Chat.zh: 在旗帜飞行员看来，若是想要走在时尚的前沿，一面鲜明的旗帜是非常重要的。然而，僵尸们却只关心他能否带领他们找到新鲜的脑子，时尚什么的，并不能拿来吃啊。

Introduction.en: Regular music-loving neon mixtape zombie.
Introduction.zh: 普普通通爱好音乐的僵尸。

Chat.en: He's cutting down on his head-banging so as not to bang his head clean off.
Chat.zh: 他减少了晃头的次数，以免把头晃下来。

Introduction.en: Cones provide protection and focus the sound of righteous tunes.
Introduction.zh: 路障可提供保护，还能助他专注于纠正自己的曲调。

Chat.en: Neon Conehead Zombie used to be a big believer in de-evolution, but then he forgot what it meant.
Chat.zh: 霓虹路障僵尸曾经是退化论的忠实信徒，但后来他忘记了退化论的含义。

Introduction.en: Buckets absorb damage because that's just what they do.
Introduction.zh: 铁桶抵御攻击，因为这就是它的作用。

Chat.en: Neon Buckethead Zombie had to go all the way to the dump to find a headband he really liked.
Chat.zh: 霓虹铁桶僵尸不得不跑到垃圾场去找他真正喜欢的头巾。

Introduction.en: Marks the arrival of a huge mixtape-making "wave" of zombies.
Introduction.zh: 预示着一大波音乐人僵尸的到来。

Chat.en: Fluorescent colors and little yellow plastic strips are the marks of a truly hip, groundbreaking new style of zombie wave flag.
Chat.zh: 荧光色和黄色塑料小条是僵尸旗帜的标志，是一种真正时髦、开创性的新样式。

Introduction.en: Moshes plants back a space when his jam is playing.
Introduction.zh: 舞蹈时，将植物向左侧空间踢走。

DESCRIPTION.en: Magnet Shrooms pull off his head
DESCRIPTION.zh: 磁力菇能吸走他的头
